an,empty,net,slashed,and,torn,and,hanging,from,some,trees,was,the,only,sign,of,fisherfolk,[END]
a,young,girl,watering,her,horse,rode,off,as,soon,as,she,glimpsed,their,sail,[END]
later,they,passed,a,dozen,peasants,digging,in,a,field,beneath,the,shell,of,a,burnt,towerhouse,[END]
the,men,gazed,at,them,with,dull,eyes,and,went,back,to,their,labors,once,they,decided,the,skiff,was,no,threat,[END]
the,red,fork,was,wide,and,slow,a,meandering,river,of,loops,and,bends,dotted,with,tiny,wooded,islets,and,frequently,choked,by,sandbars,and,snags,that,lurked,just,below,the,water's,surface,[END]
brienne,seemed,to,have,a,keen,eye,for,the,dangers,though,and,always,seemed,to,find,the,channel,[END]
when,jaime,complimented,her,on,her,knowledge,of,the,river,she,looked,at,him,suspiciously,and,said,i,do,not,know,the,river,[END]
tarth,is,an,island,[END]
i,learned,to,manage,oars,and,sail,before,i,ever,sat,a,horse,[END]
ser,cleos,sat,up,and,rubbed,at,his,eyes,[END]
gods,my,arms,are,sore,[END]
i,hope,the,wind,lasts,[END]
he,sniffed,at,it,[END]
i,smell,rain,[END]
jaime,would,welcome,a,good,rain,[END]
the,dungeons,of,riverrun,were,not,the,cleanest,place,in,the,seven,kingdoms,[END]
by,now,he,must,smell,like,an,overripe,cheese,[END]
cleos,squinted,downriver,[END]
smoke,[END]
a,thin,grey,finger,crooked,them,on,[END]
it,was,rising,from,the,south,bank,several,miles,on,twisting,and,curling,[END]
below,jaime,made,out,the,smouldering,remains,of,a,large,building,and,a,live,oak,full,of,dead,women,[END]
the,crows,had,scarcely,started,on,their,corpses,[END]
the,thin,ropes,cut,deeply,into,the,soft,flesh,of,their,throats,and,when,the,wind,blew,they,twisted,and,swayed,[END]
this,was,not,chivalrously,done,said,brienne,when,they,were,close,enough,to,see,it,clearly,[END]
no,true,knight,would,condone,such,wanton,butchery,[END]
true,knights,see,worse,every,time,they,ride,to,war,wench,said,jaime,[END]
and,do,worse,yes,[END]

i'll,leave,no,innocents,to,be,food,for,crows,[END]
a,heartless,wench,[END]

as,brienne,lowered,the,sail,jaime,climbed,out,clumsy,in,his,chains,[END]
the,red,fork,filled,his,boots,and,soaked,through,the,ragged,breeches,[END]
laughing,he,dropped,to,his,knees,plunged,his,head,under,the,water,and,came,up,drenched,and,dripping,[END]
his,hands,were,caked,with,dirt,and,when,he,rubbed,them,clean,in,the,current,they,seemed,thinner,and,paler,than,he,remembered,[END]
his,legs,were,stiff,as,well,and,unsteady,when,he,put,his,weight,upon,them,[END]
i,was,too,bloody,long,in,hoster,tully's,dungeon,[END]
brienne,and,cleos,dragged,the,skiff,onto,the,bank,[END]

one,of,us,will,need,to,cut,them,down,the,wench,said,[END]

archers,[END]

the,rapidity,with,which,the,galley,began,to,fill,with,water,suggested,that,the,smaller,fragment,had,punched,right,through,her,hull,[END]

she,threw,herself,off,the,rock,and,looked,almost,graceful,as,she,folded,into,a,dive,[END]

she's,even,uglier,wet,[END]
who,would,have,thought,it,possible,[END]

davos,[END]
he,watched,the,sail,grow,for,a,long,time,trying,to,decide,whether,he,would,sooner,live,or,die,[END]
dying,would,be,easier,he,knew,[END]
all,he,had,to,do,was,crawl,inside,his,cave,and,let,the,ship,pass,by,and,death,would,find,him,[END]
for,days,now,the,fever,had,been,burning,through,him,turning,his,bowels,to,brown,water,and,making,him,shiver,in,his,restless,sleep,[END]
each,morning,found,him,weaker,[END]
it,will,not,be,much,longer,he,had,taken,to,telling,himself,[END]

he,had,no,fresh,water,here,but,for,the,occasional,rainfall,that,pooled,in,hollows,on,the,rock,[END]
only,three,days,past,or,had,it,been,four,[END]
on,his,rock,it,was,hard,to,tell,the,days,apart,his,pools,had,been,dry,as,old,bone,and,the,sight,of,the,bay,rippling,green,and,grey,all,around,him,had,been,almost,more,than,he,could,bear,[END]
once,he,began,to,drink,seawater,the,end,would,come,swiftly,he,knew,but,all,the,same,he,had,almost,taken,that,first,swallow,so,parched,was,his,throat,[END]
a,sudden,squall,had,saved,him,[END]
he,had,grown,so,feeble,by,then,that,it,was,all,he,could,do,to,lie,in,the,rain,with,his,eyes,closed,and,his,mouth,open,and,let,the,water,splash,down,on,his,cracked,lips,and,swollen,tongue,[END]
but,afterward,he,felt,a,little,stronger,and,the,island's,pools,and,cracks,and,crevices,once,more,had,brimmed,with,life,[END]
but,that,had,been,three,days,ago,or,maybe,four,and,most,of,the,water,was,gone,now,[END]
some,had,evaporated,and,he,had,sucked,up,the,rest,[END]
by,the,morrow,he,would,be,tasting,the,mud,again,and,licking,the,damp,cold,stones,at,the,bottom,of,the,depressions,[END]
and,if,not,thirst,or,fever,starvation,would,kill,him,[END]
his,island,was,no,more,than,a,barren,spire,jutting,up,out,of,the,immensity,of,blackwater,bay,[END]
when,the,tide,was,low,he,could,sometimes,find,tiny,crabs,along,the,stony,strand,where,he,had,washed,ashore,after,the,battle,[END]
they,nipped,his,fingers,painfully,before,he,smashed,them,apart,on,the,rocks,to,suck,the,meat,from,their,claws,and,the,guts,from,their,shells,[END]
but,the,strand,vanished,whenever,the,tide,came,rushing,in,and,davos,had,to,scramble,up,the,rock,to,keep,from,being,swept,out,into,the,bay,once,more,[END]
the,point,of,the,spire,was,fifteen,feet,above,the,water,at,high,tide,but,when,the,bay,grew,rough,the,spray,went,even,higher,so,there,was,no,way,to,keep,dry,even,in,his,cave,which,was,really,no,more,than,a,hollow,in,the,rock,beneath,an,overhang,[END]
nothing,grew,on,the,rock,but,lichen,and,even,the,seabirds,shunned,the,place,[END]
now,and,again,some,gulls,would,land,atop,the,spire,and,davos,would,try,to,catch,one,but,they,were,too,quick,for,him,to,get,close,[END]
he,took,to,flinging,stones,at,them,but,he,was,too,weak,to,throw,with,much,force,so,even,when,his,stones,hit,the,gulls,would,only,scream,at,him,in,annoyance,and,then,take,to,the,air,[END]
there,were,other,rocks,visible,from,his,refuge,distant,stony,spires,taller,than,his,own,[END]
the,nearest,stood,a,good,forty,feet,above,the,water,he,guessed,though,it,was,hard,to,be,sure,at,this,distance,[END]

but,the,water,was,cold,here,the,currents,strong,and,treacherous,and,he,knew,he,did,not,have,the,strength,for,such,a,swim,[END]
that,would,kill,him,as,sure,as,drinking,seawater,[END]
autumn,in,the,narrow,sea,could,often,be,wet,and,rainy,he,remembered,from,years,past,[END]

fever,and,chills,assaulted,him,in,turn,and,of,late,he,had,developed,a,persistent,racking,cough,[END]

driftwood,and,bits,of,charred,debris,would,wash,up,on,the,strand,during,low,tide,but,he,had,no,way,to,strike,a,spark,or,start,a,fire,[END]

they,were,his,companions,with,him,every,hour,of,every,day,and,in,time,he,had,come,to,think,of,them,as,his,friends,[END]

they,descended,the,ridge,without,banners,or,trumpets,the,quiet,broken,only,by,the,distant,murmur,of,the,river,the,clop,of,hooves,and,the,clacking,of,rattleshirt's,bone,armor,[END]
somewhere,above,an,eagle,soared,on,great,blue-grey,wings,while,below,came,men,and,dogs,and,horses,and,one,white,direwolf,[END]
a,stone,bounced,down,the,slope,disturbed,by,a,passing,hoof,and,jon,saw,ghost,turn,his,head,at,the,sudden,sound,[END]
he,had,followed,the,riders,at,a,distance,all,day,as,was,his,custom,but,when,the,moon,rose,over,the,soldier,pines,he'd,come,bounding,up,red,eyes,aglow,[END]
rattleshirt's,dogs,greeted,him,with,a,chorus,of,snarls,and,growls,and,wild,barking,as,ever,but,the,direwolf,paid,them,no,mind,[END]
six,days,ago,the,largest,hound,had,attacked,him,from,behind,as,the,wildlings,camped,for,the,night,but,ghost,had,turned,and,lunged,sending,the,dog,fleeing,with,a,bloody,haunch,[END]
the,rest,of,the,pack,maintained,a,healthy,distance,after,that,[END]
jon,snow's,garron,whickered,softly,but,a,touch,and,a,soft,word,soon,quieted,the,animal,[END]
would,that,his,own,fears,could,be,calmed,so,easily,[END]
he,was,all,in,black,the,black,of,the,night's,watch,but,the,enemy,rode,before,and,behind,[END]
wildlings,and,i,am,with,them,[END]
ygritte,wore,the,cloak,of,qhorin,halfhand,[END]
lenyl,had,his,hauberk,the,big,spearwife,ragwyle,his,gloves,one,of,the,bowmen,his,boots,[END]
qhorin's,helm,had,been,won,by,the,short,homely,man,called,longspear,ryk,but,it,fit,poorly,on,his,narrow,head,so,he'd,given,that,to,ygritte,as,well,[END]
and,rattleshirt,had,qhorin's,bones,in,his,bag,along,with,the,bloody,head,of,ebben,who,set,out,with,jon,to,scout,the,skirling,pass,[END]
dead,all,dead,but,me,and,i,am,dead,to,the,world,[END]
ygritte,rode,just,behind,him,[END]
in,front,was,longspear,ryk,[END]
the,lord,of,bones,had,made,the,two,of,them,his,guards,[END]
if,the,crow,flies,i'll,boil,your,bones,as,well,he,warned,them,when,they,had,set,out,smiling,through,the,crooked,teeth,of,the,giant's,skull,he,wore,for,a,helm,[END]
ygritte,hooted,at,him,[END]
you,want,to,guard,him,[END]
if,you,want,us,to,do,it,leave,us,be,and,we'll,do,it,[END]
these,are,a,free,folk,indeed,jon,saw,[END]
rattleshirt,might,lead,them,but,none,of,them,were,shy,in,talking,back,to,him,[END]
the,wildling,leader,fixed,him,with,an,unfriendly,stare,[END]
might,be,you,fooled,these,others,crow,but,don't,think,you'll,be,fooling,mance,[END]
he'll,take,one,look,a',you,and,know,you're,false,[END]
and,when,he,does,i'll,make,a,cloak,o',your,wolf,there,and,open,your,soft,boy's,belly,and,sew,a,weasel,up,inside,[END]
jon's,sword,hand,opened,and,closed,flexing,the,burned,fingers,beneath,the,glove,but,longspear,ryk,only,laughed,[END]
and,where,would,you,find,a,weasel,in,the,snow,[END]
that,first,night,after,a,long,day,ahorse,they,made,camp,in,a,shallow,stone,bowl,atop,a,nameless,mountain,huddling,close,to,the,fire,while,the,snow,began,to,fall,[END]
jon,watched,the,flakes,melt,as,they,drifted,over,the,flames,[END]
despite,his,layers,of,wool,and,fur,and,leather,he'd,felt,cold,to,the,bone,[END]
ygritte,sat,beside,him,after,she,had,eaten,her,hood,pulled,up,and,her,hands,tucked,into,her,sleeves,for,warmth,[END]
when,mance,hears,how,you,did,for,halfhand,he'll,take,you,quick,enough,she,told,him,[END]
take,me,for,what,[END]
the,girl,laughed,scornfully,[END]
for,one,o',us,[END]
d'ya,think,you're,the,first,crow,ever,flew,down,off,the,wall,[END]
in,your,hearts,you,all,want,to,fly,free,[END]
and,when,i'm,free,he,said,slowly,will,i,be,free,to,go,[END]
sure,you,will,[END]
she,had,a,warm,smile,despite,her,crooked,teeth,[END]
and,we'll,be,free,to,kill,you,[END]
it's,dangerous,being,free,but,most,come,to,like,the,taste,o',it,[END]
she,put,her,gloved,hand,on,his,leg,just,above,the,knee,[END]
you'll,see,[END]
i,will,thought,jon,[END]
i,will,see,and,hear,and,learn,and,when,i,have,i,will,carry,the,word,back,to,the,wall,[END]
the,wildlings,had,taken,him,for,an,oathbreaker,but,in,his,heart,he,was,still,a,man,of,the,night's,watch,doing,the,last,duty,that,qhorin,halfhand,had,laid,on,him,[END]
before,i,killed,him,[END]
at,the,bottom,of,the,slope,they,came,upon,a,little,stream,flowing,down,from,the,foothills,to,join,the,milkwater,[END]
it,looked,all,stones,and,glass,though,they,could,hear,the,sound,of,water,running,beneath,the,frozen,surface,[END]
rattleshirt,led,them,across,shattering,the,thin,crust,of,ice,[END]
mance,rayder's,outriders,closed,in,as,they,emerged,[END]
jon,took,their,measure,with,a,glance,eight,riders,men,and,women,both,clad,in,fur,and,boiled,leather,with,here,and,there,a,helm,or,bit,of,mail,[END]
they,were,armed,with,spears,and,fire-hardened,lances,all,but,their,leader,a,fleshy,blond,man,with,watery,eyes,who,bore,a,great,curved,scythe,of,sharpened,steel,[END]
the,weeper,he,knew,at,once,[END]
the,black,brothers,told,tales,of,this,one,[END]
like,rattleshirt,and,harma,dogshead,and,alfyn,crowkiller,he,was,a,known,raider,[END]
the,lord,o',bones,the,weeper,said,when,he,saw,them,[END]
he,eyed,jon,and,his,wolf,[END]
who's,this,then,[END]
a,crow,come,over,said,rattleshirt,who,preferred,to,be,called,the,lord,of,bones,for,the,clattering,armor,he,wore,[END]
he,was,afraid,i'd,take,his,bones,as,well,as,halfhand's,[END]
he,shook,his,sack,of,trophies,at,the,other,wildlings,[END]
he,slew,qhorin,halfhand,said,longspear,ryk,[END]
him,and,that,wolf,o',his,[END]
and,did,for,orell,too,said,rattleshirt,[END]
the,lad's,a,warg,or,close,enough,put,in,ragwyle,the,big,spearwife,[END]
his,wolf,took,a,piece,o',halfhand's,leg,[END]
the,weeper's,red,rheumy,eyes,gave,jon,another,look,[END]
aye,[END]
well,he,has,a,wolfish,cast,to,him,now,as,i,look,close,[END]
bring,him,to,mance,might,be,he'll,keep,him,[END]
he,wheeled,his,horse,around,and,galloped,off,his,riders,hard,behind,him,[END]
the,wind,was,blowing,wet,and,heavy,as,they,crossed,the,valley,of,the,milkwater,and,rode,singlefile,through,the,river,camp,[END]
ghost,kept,close,to,jon,but,the,scent,of,him,went,before,them,like,a,herald,and,soon,there,were,wildling,dogs,all,around,them,growling,and,barking,[END]
lenyl,screamed,at,them,to,be,quiet,but,they,paid,him,no,heed,[END]
they,don't,much,care,for,that,beast,o',yours,longspear,ryk,said,to,jon,[END]
they're,dogs,and,he's,a,wolf,said,jon,[END]
they,know,he's,not,their,kind,[END]
no,more,than,i,am,yours,[END]
but,he,had,his,duty,to,be,mindful,of,the,task,qhorin,halfhand,had,laid,upon,him,as,they,shared,that,final,fire,to,play,the,part,of,turncloak,and,find,whatever,it,was,that,the,wildlings,had,been,seeking,in,the,bleak,cold,wilderness,of,the,frostfangs,[END]
some,power,qhorin,had,named,it,to,the,old,bear,but,he,had,died,before,learning,what,it,was,or,whether,mance,rayder,had,found,it,with,his,digging,[END]
there,were,cookfires,all,along,the,river,amongst,wayns,and,carts,and,sleds,[END]
many,of,the,wildlings,had,thrown,up,tents,of,hide,and,skin,and,felted,wool,[END]
others,sheltered,behind,rocks,in,crude,lean-tos,or,slept,beneath,their,wagons,[END]
at,one,fire,jon,saw,a,man,hardening,the,points,of,long,wooden,spears,and,tossing,them,in,a,pile,[END]
elsewhere,two,bearded,youths,in,boiled,leather,were,sparring,with,staffs,leaping,at,each,other,over,the,flames,grunting,each,time,one,landed,a,blow,[END]
a,dozen,women,sat,nearby,in,a,circle,fletching,arrows,[END]
arrows,for,my,brothers,jon,thought,[END]
arrows,for,my,father's,folk,for,the,people,of,winterfell,and,deepwood,motte,and,the,last,hearth,[END]
arrows,for,the,north,[END]
but,not,all,he,saw,was,warlike,[END]
he,saw,women,dancing,as,well,and,heard,a,baby,crying,and,a,little,boy,ran,in,front,of,his,garron,all,bundled,up,in,fur,and,breathless,from,play,[END]
sheep,and,goats,wandered,freely,while,oxen,plodded,along,the,riverbank,in,search,of,grass,[END]
the,smell,of,roast,mutton,drifted,from,one,cookfire,and,at,another,he,saw,a,boar,turning,on,a,wooden,spit,[END]
in,an,open,space,surrounded,by,tall,green,soldier,pines,rattleshirt,dismounted,[END]
we'll,make,camp,here,he,told,lenyl,and,ragwyle,and,the,others,[END]
feed,the,horses,then,the,dogs,then,yourself,[END]
ygritte,longspear,bring,the,crow,so,mance,can,have,his,look,[END]
we'll,gut,him,after,[END]
they,walked,the,rest,of,the,way,past,more,cookfires,and,more,tents,with,ghost,following,at,their,heels,[END]
jon,had,never,seen,so,many,wildlings,[END]
he,wondered,if,anyone,ever,had,[END]
the,camp,goes,on,forever,he,reflected,but,it's,more,a,hundred,camps,than,one,and,each,more,vulnerable,than,the,last,[END]
stretched,out,over,long,leagues,the,wildlings,had,no,defenses,to,speak,of,no,pits,nor,sharpened,stakes,only,small,groups,of,outriders,patrolling,their,perimeters,[END]
each,group,or,clan,or,village,had,simply,stopped,where,they,wanted,as,soon,as,they,saw,others,stopping,or,found,a,likely,spot,[END]
the,free,folk,[END]
if,his,brothers,were,to,catch,them,in,such,disarray,many,of,them,would,pay,for,that,freedom,with,their,life's,blood,[END]
they,had,numbers,but,the,night's,watch,had,discipline,and,in,battle,discipline,beats,numbers,nine,times,of,every,ten,his,father,had,once,told,him,[END]
there,was,no,doubting,which,tent,was,the,king's,[END]
it,was,thrice,the,size,of,the,next,largest,he'd,seen,and,he,could,hear,music,drifting,from,within,[END]
like,many,of,the,lesser,tents,it,was,made,of,sewn,hides,with,the,fur,still,on,but,mance,rayder's,hides,were,the,shaggy,white,pelts,of,snow,bears,[END]
the,peaked,roof,was,crowned,with,a,huge,set,of,antlers,from,one,of,the,giant,elks,that,had,once,roamed,freely,throughout,the,seven,kingdoms,in,the,times,of,the,first,men,[END]
here,at,least,they,found,defenders,two,guards,at,the,flap,of,the,tent,leaning,on,tall,spears,with,round,leather,shields,strapped,to,their,arms,[END]
when,they,caught,sight,of,ghost,one,of,them,lowered,his,spearpoint,and,said,that,beast,stays,here,[END]
ghost,stay,jon,commanded,[END]
the,direwolf,sat,[END]
longspear,watch,the,beast,[END]
rattleshirt,yanked,open,the,tent,and,gestured,jon,and,ygritte,inside,[END]
the,tent,was,hot,and,smoky,[END]
baskets,of,burning,peat,stood,in,all,four,corners,filling,the,air,with,a,dim,reddish,light,[END]
more,skins,carpeted,the,ground,[END]

when,his,eyes,had,adjusted,to,the,smoky,red,gloom,he,saw,six,people,none,of,whom,paid,him,any,mind,[END]
a,dark,young,man,and,a,pretty,blonde,woman,were,sharing,a,horn,of,mead,[END]
a,pregnant,woman,stood,over,a,brazier,cooking,a,brace,of,hens,while,a,grey-haired,man,in,a,tattered,cloak,of,black,and,red,sat,crosslegged,on,a,pillow,playing,a,lute,and,singing,[END]
the,dornishman's,wife,was,as,fair,as,the,sun,[END]

rattleshirt,took,off,his,yellowed,helm,as,he,waited,for,the,song,to,end,[END]

his,eyes,were,close-set,one,eyebrow,creeping,all,the,way,across,his,forehead,dark,hair,thinning,back,from,a,sharp,widow's,peak,[END]
the,dornishman's,wife,would,sing,as,she,bathed,[END]
in,a,voice,that,was,sweet,as,a,peach,[END]
but,the,dornishman's,blade,had,a,song,of,its,own,[END]
and,a,bite,sharp,and,cold,as,a,leech,[END]
beside,the,brazier,a,short,but,immensely,broad,man,sat,on,a,stool,eating,a,hen,off,a,skewer,[END]

a,few,feet,away,a,taller,leaner,man,in,a,leather,shirt,sewn,with,bronze,scales,stood,frowning,over,a,map,a,two-handed,greatsword,slung,across,his,back,in,a,leather,sheath,[END]
he,was,straight,as,a,spear,all,long,wiry,muscle,clean-shaved,bald,with,a,strong,straight,nose,and,deepset,grey,eyes,[END]
he,might,even,have,been,comely,if,he'd,had,ears,but,he,had,lost,both,along,the,way,whether,to,frostbite,or,some,enemy's,knife,jon,could,not,tell,[END]
their,lack,made,the,man's,head,seem,narrow,and,pointed,[END]

her,dothraki,called,the,sea,the,poison,water,distrusting,any,liquid,that,their,horses,could,not,drink,[END]
on,the,day,the,three,ships,had,lifted,anchor,at,quarth,you,would,have,thought,they,were,sailing,to,hell,instead,of,pentos,[END]
her,brave,young,bloodriders,had,stared,off,at,the,dwindling,coastline,with,huge,white,eyes,each,of,the,three,determined,to,show,no,fear,before,the,other,two,while,her,handmaids,irri,and,jhiqui,clutched,the,rail,desperately,and,retched,over,the,side,at,every,little,swell,[END]

when,a,sudden,squall,had,enveloped,them,six,days,into,the,voyage,she,heard,them,through,the,hatches,the,horses,kicking,and,screaming,the,riders,praying,in,thin,quavery,voices,each,time,balerion,heaved,or,swayed,[END]
no,squall,could,frighten,dany,though,[END]
daenerys,stormborn,she,was,called,for,she,had,come,howling,into,the,world,on,distant,dragonstone,as,the,greatest,storm,in,the,memory,of,westeros,howled,outside,a,storm,so,fierce,that,it,ripped,gargoyles,from,the,castle,walls,and,smashed,her,father's,fleet,to,kindling,[END]
the,narrow,sea,was,often,stormy,and,dany,had,crossed,it,half,a,hundred,times,as,a,girl,running,from,one,free,city,to,the,next,half,a,step,ahead,of,the,usurper's,hired,knives,[END]
she,loved,the,sea,[END]
she,liked,the,sharp,salty,smell,of,the,air,and,the,vastness,of,horizons,bounded,only,by,a,vault,of,azure,sky,above,[END]
it,made,her,feel,small,but,free,as,well,[END]
she,liked,the,dolphins,that,sometimes,swam,along,beside,balerion,slicing,through,the,waves,like,silvery,spears,and,the,flying,fish,they,glimpsed,now,and,again,[END]
she,even,liked,the,sailors,with,all,their,songs,and,stories,[END]
once,on,a,voyage,to,braavos,as,she'd,watched,the,crew,wrestle,down,a,great,green,sail,in,a,rising,gale,she,had,even,thought,how,fine,it,would,be,to,be,a,sailor,[END]
but,when,she,told,her,brother,viserys,had,twisted,her,hair,until,she,cried,[END]
you,are,blood,of,the,dragon,he,had,screamed,at,her,[END]
a,dragon,not,some,smelly,fish,[END]
he,was,a,fool,about,that,and,so,much,else,dany,thought,[END]
if,he,had,been,wiser,and,more,patient,it,would,be,him,sailing,west,to,take,the,throne,that,was,his,by,rights,[END]
viserys,had,been,stupid,and,vicious,she,had,come,to,realize,yet,sometimes,she,missed,him,all,the,same,[END]
not,the,cruel,weak,man,he,had,become,by,the,end,but,the,brother,who,had,sometimes,let,her,creep,into,his,bed,the,boy,who,told,her,tales,of,the,seven,kingdoms,and,talked,of,how,much,better,their,lives,would,be,once,he,claimed,his,crown,[END]
the,captain,appeared,at,her,elbow,[END]
would,that,this,balerion,could,soar,as,her,namesake,did,your,grace,he,said,in,bastard,valyrian,heavily,flavored,with,accents,of,pentos,[END]
then,we,should,not,need,to,row,nor,tow,nor,pray,for,wind,[END]
just,so,captain,she,answered,with,a,smile,pleased,to,have,won,the,man,over,[END]
captain,groleo,was,an,old,pentoshi,like,his,master,illyrio,mopatis,and,he,had,been,nervous,as,a,maiden,about,carrying,three,dragons,on,his,ship,[END]
half,a,hundred,buckets,of,seawater,still,hung,from,the,gunwales,in,case,of,fires,[END]
at,first,groleo,had,wanted,the,dragons,caged,and,dany,had,consented,to,put,his,fears,at,ease,but,their,misery,was,so,palpable,that,she,soon,changed,her,mind,and,insisted,they,be,freed,[END]
even,captain,groleo,was,glad,of,that,now,[END]
there,had,been,one,small,fire,easily,extinguished,against,that,balerion,suddenly,seemed,to,have,far,fewer,rats,than,she'd,had,before,when,she,sailed,under,the,name,saduleon,[END]
and,her,crew,once,as,fearful,as,they,were,curious,had,begun,to,take,a,queer,fierce,pride,in,their,dragons,[END]
every,man,of,them,from,captain,to,cook's,boy,loved,to,watch,the,three,fly,[END]
though,none,so,much,as,dany,[END]
they,are,my,children,she,told,herself,and,if,the,maegi,spoke,truly,they,are,the,only,children,i,am,ever,like,to,have,[END]
viserion's,scales,were,the,color,of,fresh,cream,his,horns,wing,bones,and,spinal,crest,a,dark,gold,that,flashed,bright,as,metal,in,the,sun,[END]
rhaegal,was,made,of,the,green,of,summer,and,the,bronze,of,fall,[END]
they,soared,above,the,ships,in,wide,circles,higher,and,higher,each,trying,to,climb,above,the,other,[END]
dragons,always,preferred,to,attack,from,above,dany,had,learned,[END]
should,either,get,between,the,other,and,the,sun,he,would,fold,his,wings,and,dive,screaming,and,they,would,tumble,from,the,sky,locked,together,in,a,tangled,scaly,ball,jaws,snapping,and,tails,lashing,[END]
the,first,time,they,had,done,it,she,feared,that,they,meant,to,kill,each,other,but,it,was,only,sport,[END]
no,sooner,would,they,splash,into,the,sea,than,they,would,break,apart,and,rise,again,shrieking,and,hissing,the,salt,water,steaming,off,them,as,their,wings,clawed,at,the,air,[END]
drogon,was,aloft,as,well,though,not,in,sight,he,would,be,miles,ahead,or,miles,behind,hunting,[END]
he,was,always,hungry,her,drogon,[END]
hungry,and,growing,fast,[END]
another,year,or,perhaps,two,and,he,may,be,large,enough,to,ride,[END]
then,i,shall,have,no,need,of,ships,to,cross,the,great,salt,sea,[END]
but,that,time,was,not,yet,come,[END]
rhaegal,and,viserion,were,the,size,of,small,dogs,drogon,only,a,little,larger,and,any,dog,would,have,out-weighed,them,they,were,all,wings,and,neck,and,tail,lighter,than,they,looked,[END]

food,is,the,only,vice,allowed,them,[END]

no,[END]
the,coverlet,slipped,off,dany's,shoulder,and,she,tugged,it,back,into,place,[END]

the,khal,who,led,them,was,named,temmo,[END]
his,khalasar,was,not,so,big,as,drogo's,but,it,was,big,enough,[END]
fifty,thousand,at,the,least,[END]
half,of,them,braided,warriors,with,bells,ringing,in,their,hair,[END]
the,qohorik,knew,he,was,coming,[END]
they,strengthened,their,walls,doubled,the,size,of,their,own,guard,and,hired,two,free,companies,besides,the,bright,banners,and,the,second,sons,[END]

by,the,time,the,unsullied,reached,the,city,the,sun,had,set,[END]

but,when,dawn,broke,and,temmo,and,his,bloodriders,led,their,khalasar,out,of,camp,they,found,three,thousand,unsullied,drawn,up,before,the,gates,with,the,black,goat,standard,flying,over,their,heads,[END]
so,small,a,force,could,easily,have,been,flanked,but,you,know,dothraki,[END]
these,were,men,on,foot,and,men,on,foot,are,fit,only,to,be,ridden,down,[END]

in,the,end,only,six,hundred,of,them,remained,[END]
but,more,than,twelve,thousand,dothraki,lay,dead,upon,that,field,including,khal,temmo,his,bloodriders,his,kos,and,all,his,sons,[END]

since,that,day,the,city,guard,of,qohor,has,been,made,up,solely,of,unsullied,every,one,of,whom,carries,a,tall,spear,from,which,hangs,a,braid,of,human,hair,[END]

and,i,tell,you,truly,daenerys,there,is,no,man,in,all,the,world,who,will,ever,be,half,so,true,to,you,as,me,[END]
bran,[END]
the,ridge,slanted,sharply,from,the,earth,a,long,fold,of,stone,and,soil,shaped,like,a,claw,[END]

he,could,feel,the,high,stone,calling,him,[END]
up,he,went,loping,easy,at,first,then,faster,and,higher,his,strong,legs,eating,up,the,incline,[END]
birds,burst,from,the,branches,overhead,as,he,raced,by,clawing,and,flapping,their,way,into,the,sky,[END]
he,could,hear,the,wind,sighing,up,amongst,the,leaves,the,squirrels,chittering,to,one,another,even,the,sound,a,pinecone,made,as,it,tumbled,to,the,forest,floor,[END]
the,smells,were,a,song,around,him,a,song,that,filled,the,good,green,world,[END]
gravel,flew,from,beneath,his,paws,as,he,gained,the,last,few,feet,to,stand,upon,the,crest,[END]
the,sun,hung,above,the,tall,pines,huge,and,red,and,below,him,the,trees,and,hills,went,on,and,on,as,far,as,he,could,see,or,smell,[END]
a,kite,was,circling,far,above,dark,against,the,pink,sky,[END]
prince,[END]
the,man-sound,came,into,his,head,suddenly,yet,he,could,feel,the,rightness,of,it,[END]
prince,of,the,green,prince,of,the,wolfswood,[END]
he,was,strong,and,swift,and,fierce,and,all,that,lived,in,the,good,green,world,went,in,fear,of,him,[END]
far,below,at,the,base,of,the,woods,something,moved,amongst,the,trees,[END]
a,flash,of,grey,quick-glimpsed,and,gone,again,but,it,was,enough,to,make,his,ears,prick,up,[END]
down,there,beside,a,swift,green,brook,another,form,slipped,by,running,[END]
wolves,he,knew,[END]
his,little,cousins,chasing,down,some,prey,[END]
now,the,prince,could,see,more,of,them,shadows,on,fleet,grey,paws,[END]
a,pack,[END]
he,had,a,pack,as,well,once,[END]
five,they,had,been,and,a,sixth,who,stood,aside,[END]
somewhere,down,inside,him,were,the,sounds,the,men,had,given,them,to,tell,one,from,the,other,but,it,was,not,by,their,sounds,he,knew,them,[END]
he,remembered,their,scents,his,brothers,and,his,sisters,[END]
they,all,had,smelled,alike,had,smelled,of,pack,but,each,was,different,too,[END]
his,angry,brother,with,the,hot,green,eyes,was,near,the,prince,felt,though,he,had,not,seen,him,for,many,hunts,[END]
yet,with,every,sun,that,set,he,grew,more,distant,and,he,had,been,the,last,[END]
the,others,were,far,scattered,like,leaves,blown,by,the,wild,wind,[END]
sometimes,he,could,sense,them,though,as,if,they,were,still,with,him,only,hidden,from,his,sight,by,a,boulder,or,a,stand,of,trees,[END]
he,could,not,smell,them,nor,hear,their,howls,by,night,yet,he,felt,their,presence,at,his,back,[END]
all,but,the,sister,they,had,lost,[END]
his,tail,drooped,when,he,remembered,her,[END]
four,now,not,five,[END]
four,and,one,more,the,white,who,has,no,voice,[END]
these,woods,belonged,to,them,the,snowy,slopes,and,stony,hills,the,great,green,pines,and,the,golden,leaf,oaks,the,rushing,streams,and,blue,lakes,fringed,with,fingers,of,white,frost,[END]
but,his,sister,had,left,the,wilds,to,walk,in,the,halls,of,man-rock,where,other,hunters,ruled,and,once,within,those,halls,it,was,hard,to,find,the,path,back,out,[END]
the,wolf,prince,remembered,[END]
the,wind,shifted,suddenly,[END]
deer,and,fear,and,blood,[END]
the,scent,of,prey,woke,the,hunger,in,him,[END]
the,prince,sniffed,the,air,again,turning,and,then,he,was,off,bounding,along,the,ridgetop,with,jaws,half-parted,[END]
the,far,side,of,the,ridge,was,steeper,than,the,one,he'd,come,up,but,he,flew,surefoot,over,stones,and,roots,and,rotting,leaves,down,the,slope,and,through,the,trees,long,strides,eating,up,the,ground,[END]
the,scent,pulled,him,onward,ever,faster,[END]
the,deer,was,down,and,dying,when,he,reached,her,ringed,by,eight,of,his,small,grey,cousins,[END]
the,heads,of,the,pack,had,begun,to,feed,the,male,first,and,then,his,female,taking,turns,tearing,flesh,from,the,red,underbelly,of,their,prey,[END]
the,others,waited,patiently,all,but,the,tail,who,paced,in,a,wary,circle,a,few,strides,from,the,rest,his,own,tail,tucked,low,[END]
he,would,eat,the,last,of,all,whatever,his,brothers,left,him,[END]
the,prince,was,downwind,so,they,did,not,sense,him,until,he,leapt,up,upon,a,fallen,log,six,strides,from,where,they,fed,[END]
the,tail,saw,him,first,gave,a,piteous,whine,and,slunk,away,[END]
his,pack,brothers,turned,at,the,sound,and,bared,their,teeth,snarling,all,but,the,head,male,and,female,[END]
the,direwolf,answered,the,snarls,with,a,low,warning,growl,and,showed,them,his,own,teeth,[END]
he,was,bigger,than,his,cousins,twice,the,size,of,the,scrawny,tail,half,again,as,large,as,the,two,pack,heads,[END]

you,are,only,a,boy,i,know,but,you,are,our,prince,as,well,our,lord's,son,and,our,king's,true,heir,[END]
we,have,sworn,you,our,faith,by,earth,and,water,bronze,and,iron,ice,and,fire,[END]
the,risk,is,yours,bran,as,is,the,gift,[END]
the,choice,should,be,yours,too,i,think,[END]
we,are,your,servants,to,command,[END]
she,grinned,[END]
at,least,in,this,[END]
you,mean,bran,said,you'll,do,what,i,say,[END]
truly,[END]
truly,my,prince,the,girl,replied,so,consider,well,[END]
bran,tried,to,think,it,through,the,way,his,father,might,have,[END]
the,greatjon's,uncles,hother,whoresbane,and,mors,crowfood,were,fierce,men,but,he,thought,they,would,be,loyal,[END]
and,the,karstarks,them,too,[END]
karhold,was,a,strong,castle,father,always,said,[END]
we,would,be,safe,with,the,umbers,or,the,karstarks,[END]
or,they,could,go,south,to,fat,lord,manderly,[END]
at,winterfell,he'd,laughed,a,lot,and,never,seemed,to,look,at,bran,with,so,much,pity,as,the,other,lords,[END]
castle,cerwyn,was,closer,than,white,harbor,but,maester,luwin,had,said,that,cley,cerwyn,was,dead,[END]
the,umbers,and,the,karstarks,and,the,manderlys,may,all,be,dead,as,well,he,realized,[END]
as,he,would,be,if,he,was,caught,by,the,ironmen,or,the,bastard,of,bolton,[END]
if,they,stayed,here,hidden,down,beneath,tumbledown,tower,no,one,would,find,them,[END]
he,would,stay,alive,[END]
and,crippled,[END]
bran,realized,he,was,crying,[END]
stupid,baby,he,thought,at,himself,[END]
no,matter,where,he,went,to,karhold,or,white,harbor,or,greywater,watch,he'd,be,a,cripple,when,he,got,there,[END]

i,want,to,fly,he,told,them,[END]
please,[END]
take,me,to,the,crow,[END]
davos,[END]
when,he,came,up,on,deck,the,long,point,of,driftmark,was,dwindling,behind,them,while,dragonstone,rose,from,the,sea,ahead,[END]

the,great,fire,that,burned,atop,the,sharp,point,watchtower,at,the,end,of,massey's,hook,reminded,him,of,the,ruby,she,wore,at,her,throat,and,when,the,world,turned,red,at,dawn,and,sunset,the,drifting,clouds,turned,the,same,color,as,the,silks,and,satins,of,her,rustling,gowns,[END]
she,would,be,waiting,on,dragonstone,as,well,waiting,in,all,her,beauty,and,all,her,power,with,her,god,and,her,shadows,and,his,king,[END]
the,red,priestess,had,always,seemed,loyal,to,stannis,until,now,[END]
she,has,broken,him,as,a,man,breaks,a,horse,[END]
she,would,ride,him,to,power,if,she,could,and,for,that,she,gave,my,sons,to,the,fire,[END]
i,will,cut,the,living,heart,from,her,breast,and,see,how,it,burns,[END]
he,touched,the,hilt,of,the,fine,long,lysene,dirk,that,the,captain,had,given,him,[END]

his,name,was,khorane,sathmantes,a,lyseni,like,salladhor,saan,whose,ship,this,was,[END]

when,he,learned,that,the,man,he,had,plucked,from,the,sea,was,the,celebrated,onion,knight,he,gave,him,the,use,of,his,own,cabin,and,his,own,clothes,and,a,pair,of,new,boots,that,almost,fit,[END]
he,insisted,that,davos,share,his,provisions,as,well,though,that,turned,out,badly,[END]
his,stomach,could,not,tolerate,the,snails,and,lampreys,and,other,rich,food,captain,khorane,so,relished,and,after,his,first,meal,at,the,captain's,table,he,spent,the,rest,of,the,day,with,one,end,or,the,other,dangling,over,the,rail,[END]

he,will,forgive,me,catelyn,told,herself,[END]

someone,[END]
jon,[END]
big,enough,for,you,[END]

jon's,garron,shied,frightened,by,such,strangeness,but,whether,it,was,the,mammoths,or,their,riders,that,scared,him,it,was,hard,to,say,[END]
even,ghost,backed,off,a,step,baring,his,teeth,in,a,silent,snarl,[END]
the,direwolf,was,big,but,the,mammoths,were,a,deal,bigger,and,there,were,many,and,more,of,them,[END]
jon,took,the,horse,in,hand,and,held,him,still,so,he,could,count,the,giants,emerging,from,the,blowing,snow,and,pale,mists,that,swirled,along,the,milkwater,[END]

there,must,be,hundreds,[END]
no,matter,how,many,went,past,they,just,seemed,to,keep,coming,[END]
in,old,nan's,stories,giants,were,outsized,men,who,lived,in,colossal,castles,fought,with,huge,swords,and,walked,about,in,boots,a,boy,could,hide,in,[END]
these,were,something,else,more,bearlike,than,human,and,as,wooly,as,the,mammoths,they,rode,[END]

ten,feet,tall,maybe,or,twelve,jon,thought,[END]

their,legs,were,shorter,than,their,arms,but,very,thick,and,they,wore,no,boots,at,all,their,feet,were,broad,splayed,things,hard,and,horny,and,black,[END]
neckless,their,huge,heavy,heads,thrust,forward,from,between,their,shoulder,blades,and,their,faces,were,squashed,and,brutal,[END]

that's,hair,[END]

and,joramun,blew,the,horn,of,winter,and,woke,giants,from,the,earth,[END]

har,[END]

i,was,in,me,ruddy,hall,with,only,a,cask,o',mead,to,keep,me,company,and,nothing,to,do,but,drink,it,[END]

the,more,i,drank,the,more,i,thought,about,her,and,the,more,i,thought,the,harder,me,member,got,till,i,couldn't,suffer,it,no,more,[END]

the,snow,was,coming,down,so,hard,i,got,turned,around,once,or,twice,and,the,wind,blew,right,through,me,and,froze,me,bones,but,finally,i,come,on,her,all,bundled,up,like,i,was,[END]
the,woman,had,a,terrible,temper,and,she,put,up,quite,the,fight,when,i,laid,hands,on,her,[END]
it,was,all,i,could,do,to,carry,her,home,and,get,her,out,o',them,furs,but,when,i,did,oh,she,was,hotter,even,than,i,remembered,and,we,had,a,fine,old,time,and,then,i,went,to,sleep,[END]
next,morning,when,i,woke,the,snow,had,stopped,and,the,sun,was,shining,but,i,was,in,no,fit,state,to,enjoy,it,[END]
all,ripped,and,torn,i,was,and,half,me,member,bit,right,off,and,there,on,me,floor,was,a,she-bear's,pelt,[END]

har,[END]
he,slapped,a,meaty,thigh,[END]
would,that,i,could,find,her,again,[END]
she,was,fine,to,lay,with,that,bear,[END]
never,was,a,woman,gave,me,such,a,fight,nor,such,strong,sons,neither,[END]
what,could,you,do,if,you,did,find,her,[END]
jon,asked,smiling,[END]
you,said,she,bit,your,member,off,[END]
only,half,[END]

the,next,he,knew,he,was,on,his,face,with,the,taste,of,mud,and,blood,in,his,mouth,and,ygritte,kneeling,over,him,protectively,a,bone,dagger,in,her,hand,[END]

her,ladies,welcomed,sansa,as,well,[END]

megga,was,round,and,loud,alla,shy,and,pretty,but,elinor,ruled,the,three,by,right,of,womanhood,she,was,a,maiden,flowered,whereas,megga,and,alla,were,mere,girls,[END]
the,cousins,took,sansa,into,their,company,as,if,they,had,known,her,all,their,lives,[END]
they,spent,long,afternoons,doing,needlework,and,talking,over,lemon,cakes,and,honeyed,wine,played,at,tiles,of,an,evening,sang,together,in,the,castle,sept,[END]
and,often,one,or,two,of,them,would,be,chosen,to,share,margaery's,bed,where,they,would,whisper,half,the,night,away,[END]
alla,had,a,lovely,voice,and,when,coaxed,would,play,the,woodharp,and,sing,songs,of,chivalry,and,lost,loves,[END]
megga,couldn't,sing,but,she,was,mad,to,be,kissed,[END]
she,and,alla,played,a,kissing,game,sometimes,she,confessed,but,it,wasn't,the,same,as,kissing,a,man,much,less,a,king,[END]
sansa,wondered,what,megga,would,think,about,kissing,the,hound,as,she,had,[END]
he'd,come,to,her,the,night,of,the,battle,stinking,of,wine,and,blood,[END]
he,kissed,me,and,threatened,to,kill,me,and,made,me,sing,him,a,song,[END]
king,joffrey,has,such,beautiful,lips,megga,gushed,oblivious,oh,poor,sansa,how,your,heart,must,have,broken,when,you,lost,him,[END]

sometimes,it,fell,from,a,white,sky,and,sometimes,from,a,black,but,that,was,all,that,remained,of,day,and,night,[END]
he,wore,it,on,his,shoulders,like,a,second,cloak,and,it,piled,up,high,atop,the,pack,he,carried,and,made,it,even,heavier,and,harder,to,bear,[END]
the,small,of,his,back,hurt,abominably,as,if,someone,had,shoved,a,knife,in,there,and,was,wiggling,it,back,and,forth,with,every,step,[END]

he,would,have,given,most,anything,to,take,it,off,but,he,was,afraid,to,[END]

he,wasn't,though,and,it,was,no,good,wishing,[END]
sam,was,weak,and,fat,so,very,fat,he,could,hardly,bear,his,own,weight,the,mail,was,much,too,much,for,him,[END]

the,crust,was,broken,where,he,set,his,feet,otherwise,he,did,not,think,he,could,have,moved,at,all,[END]
off,to,the,left,and,right,half-seen,through,the,silent,trees,torches,turned,to,vague,orange,haloes,in,the,falling,snow,[END]

as,he,walked,it,seemed,as,if,he,were,chasing,the,torches,ahead,of,him,but,they,had,legs,as,well,longer,and,stronger,than,his,so,he,could,never,catch,them,[END]
yesterday,he,begged,for,them,to,let,him,be,one,of,the,torchbearers,even,if,it,meant,walking,outside,of,the,column,with,the,darkness,pressing,close,[END]

the,cell,was,warmer,than,any,cell,had,a,right,to,be,[END]

the,smooth,stony,passages,beneath,the,great,mass,of,dragonstone,were,always,warm,and,davos,had,often,heard,it,said,they,grew,warmer,the,farther,down,one,went,[END]
he,was,well,below,the,castle,he,judged,and,the,wall,of,his,cell,often,felt,warm,to,his,touch,when,he,pressed,a,palm,against,it,[END]

the,cough,that,had,plagued,him,since,the,battle,grew,worse,and,a,fever,took,hold,of,him,as,well,[END]
his,lips,broke,with,blood,blisters,and,the,warmth,of,the,cell,did,not,stop,his,shivering,[END]
i,will,not,linger,long,he,remembered,thinking,[END]
i,will,die,soon,here,in,the,dark,[END]
davos,soon,found,that,he,was,wrong,about,that,as,about,so,much,else,[END]
dimly,he,remembered,gentle,hands,and,a,firm,voice,and,young,maester,pylos,looking,down,on,him,[END]
he,was,given,hot,garlic,broth,to,drink,and,milk,of,the,poppy,to,take,away,his,aches,and,shivers,[END]
the,poppy,made,him,sleep,and,while,he,slept,they,leeched,him,to,drain,off,the,bad,blood,[END]
or,so,he,surmised,by,the,leech,marks,on,his,arms,when,he,woke,[END]
before,very,long,the,coughing,stopped,the,blisters,vanished,and,his,broth,had,chunks,of,whitefish,in,it,and,carrots,and,onions,as,well,[END]
and,one,day,he,realized,that,he,felt,stronger,than,he,had,since,black,betha,shattered,beneath,him,and,flung,him,in,the,river,[END]
he,had,two,gaolers,to,tend,him,[END]
one,was,broad,and,squat,with,thick,shoulders,and,huge,strong,hands,[END]
he,wore,a,leather,brigantine,dotted,with,iron,studs,and,once,a,day,brought,davos,a,bowl,of,oaten,porridge,[END]
sometimes,he,sweetened,it,with,honey,or,poured,in,a,bit,of,milk,[END]
the,other,gaoler,was,older,stooped,and,sallow,with,greasy,unwashed,hair,and,pebbled,skin,[END]
he,wore,a,doublet,of,white,velvet,with,a,ring,of,stars,worked,upon,the,breast,in,golden,thread,[END]
it,fit,him,badly,being,both,too,short,and,too,loose,and,was,soiled,and,torn,besides,[END]
he,would,bring,davos,plates,of,meat,and,mash,or,fish,stew,and,once,even,half,a,lamprey,pie,[END]
the,lamprey,was,so,rich,he,could,not,keep,it,down,but,even,so,it,was,a,rare,treat,for,a,prisoner,in,a,dungeon,[END]
neither,sun,nor,moon,shone,in,the,dungeons,no,windows,pierced,the,thick,stone,walls,[END]
the,only,way,to,tell,day,from,night,was,by,his,gaolers,[END]
neither,man,would,speak,to,him,though,he,knew,they,were,no,mutes,sometimes,he,heard,them,exchange,a,few,brusque,words,as,the,watch,was,changing,[END]
they,would,not,even,tell,him,their,names,so,he,gave,them,names,of,his,own,[END]
the,short,strong,one,he,called,porridge,the,stooped,sallow,one,lamprey,for,the,pie,[END]
he,marked,the,passage,of,days,by,the,meals,they,brought,and,by,the,changing,of,the,torches,in,the,sconce,outside,his,cell,[END]

perhaps,i,shall,do,the,same,before,this,day,is,done,[END]

sansa,did,all,that,was,required,of,her,[END]
there,were,prayers,and,vows,and,singing,and,tall,candles,burning,a,hundred,dancing,lights,that,the,tears,in,her,eyes,transformed,into,a,thousand,[END]

except,it,seemed,to,her,that,some,of,them,were,laughing,too,hard,somehow,[END]
it,would,have,been,a,good,time,to,sneak,away,and,steal,a,horse,but,arya,couldn't,see,how,that,would,help,her,[END]
she,could,only,ride,as,far,as,the,city,gates,[END]
that,captain,would,never,let,me,pass,and,if,he,did,harwin,would,come,after,me,or,that,huntsman,with,his,dogs,[END]
she,wished,she,had,her,map,so,she,could,see,how,far,stoney,sept,was,from,riverrun,[END]
by,the,time,her,cup,was,empty,arya,was,yawning,[END]
gendry,hadn't,come,back,[END]
tom,sevenstrings,was,singing,two,hearts,that,beat,as,one,and,kissing,a,different,girl,at,the,end,of,every,verse,[END]
in,the,corner,by,the,window,lem,and,harwin,sat,talking,to,red-haired,tansy,in,low,voices,[END]
spent,the,night,in,jaime's,cell,she,heard,the,woman,say,[END]
her,and,this,other,wench,the,one,who,slew,renly,[END]
all,three,o',them,together,and,come,the,morn,lady,catelyn,cut,him,loose,for,love,[END]
she,gave,a,throaty,chuckle,[END]
it's,not,true,arya,thought,[END]
she,never,would,[END]
she,felt,sad,and,angry,and,lonely,all,at,once,[END]
an,old,man,sat,down,beside,her,[END]
well,aren't,you,a,pretty,little,peach,[END]
his,breath,smelled,near,as,foul,as,the,dead,men,in,the,cages,and,his,little,pig,eyes,were,crawling,up,and,down,her,[END]
does,my,sweet,peach,have,a,name,[END]
for,half,a,heartbeat,she,forgot,who,she,was,supposed,to,be,[END]
she,wasn't,any,peach,but,she,couldn't,be,arya,stark,either,not,here,with,some,smelly,drunk,she,did,not,know,[END]
i'm,[END]
she's,my,sister,[END]
gendry,put,a,heavy,hand,on,the,old,man's,shoulder,and,squeezed,[END]
leave,her,be,[END]
the,man,turned,spoiling,for,a,quarrel,but,when,he,saw,gendry's,size,he,thought,better,of,it,[END]
your,sister,is,she,[END]
what,kind,of,brother,are,you,[END]
i'd,never,bring,no,sister,of,mine,to,the,peach,that,i,wouldn't,[END]
he,got,up,from,the,bench,and,moved,off,muttering,in,search,of,a,new,friend,[END]

arya,hopped,to,her,feet,[END]
you're,not,my,brother,[END]
that's,right,he,said,angrily,[END]
i'm,too,bloody,lowborn,to,be,kin,to,m'lady,high,[END]
arya,was,taken,aback,by,the,fury,in,his,voice,[END]
that's,not,the,way,i,meant,it,[END]
yes,it,is,[END]
he,sat,down,on,the,bench,cradling,a,cup,of,wine,between,his,hands,[END]
go,away,[END]

but,[END]
i,said,go,away,[END]
m'lady,[END]
arya,whirled,and,left,him,there,[END]
a,stupid,bullheaded,bastard,boy,that's,all,he,is,[END]
he,could,ring,all,the,bells,he,wanted,it,was,nothing,to,her,[END]
their,sleeping,room,was,at,the,top,of,the,stairs,under,the,eaves,[END]
maybe,the,peach,had,no,lack,of,beds,but,there,was,only,one,to,spare,for,the,likes,of,them,[END]
it,was,a,big,bed,though,[END]
it,filled,the,whole,room,just,about,and,the,musty,straw-stuffed,mattress,looked,large,enough,for,all,of,them,[END]
just,now,though,she,had,it,to,herself,[END]
her,real,clothes,were,hanging,from,a,peg,on,the,wall,between,gendry's,stuff,and,lem's,[END]

king,joffrey,ser,ilyn,ser,meryn,[END]
dunsen,raff,and,polliver,[END]
the,tickler,the,hound,and,ser,gregor,the,mountain,[END]
she,liked,to,mix,up,the,order,of,the,names,sometimes,[END]
it,helped,her,remember,who,they,were,and,what,they'd,done,[END]
maybe,some,of,them,are,dead,she,thought,[END]
maybe,they're,in,iron,cages,someplace,and,the,crows,are,picking,out,their,eyes,[END]
sleep,came,as,quick,as,she,closed,her,eyes,[END]
she,dreamed,of,wolves,that,night,stalking,through,a,wet,wood,with,the,smell,of,rain,and,rot,and,blood,thick,in,the,air,[END]
only,they,were,good,smells,in,the,dream,and,arya,knew,she,had,nothing,to,fear,[END]
she,was,strong,and,swift,and,fierce,and,her,pack,was,all,around,her,her,brothers,and,her,sisters,[END]
they,ran,down,a,frightened,horse,together,tore,its,throat,out,and,feasted,[END]
and,when,the,moon,broke,through,the,clouds,she,threw,back,her,head,and,howled,[END]
but,when,the,day,came,she,woke,to,the,barking,of,dogs,[END]
arya,sat,up,yawning,[END]
gendry,was,stirring,on,her,left,and,lem,lemoncloak,snoring,loudly,to,her,right,but,the,baying,outside,all,but,drowned,him,out,[END]
there,must,be,half,a,hundred,dogs,out,there,[END]
she,crawled,from,under,the,blankets,and,hopped,over,lem,tom,and,jack-be-lucky,to,the,window,[END]
when,she,opened,the,shutters,wide,wind,and,wet,and,cold,all,came,flooding,in,together,[END]
the,day,was,grey,and,overcast,[END]
down,below,in,the,square,the,dogs,were,barking,running,in,circles,growling,and,howling,[END]
there,was,a,pack,of,them,great,black,mastiffs,and,lean,wolfhounds,and,black-and-white,sheepdogs,and,kinds,arya,did,not,know,shaggy,brindled,beasts,with,long,yellow,teeth,[END]
between,the,inn,and,the,fountain,a,dozen,riders,sat,astride,their,horses,watching,the,townsmen,open,the,fat,man's,cage,and,tug,his,arm,until,his,swollen,corpse,spilled,out,onto,the,ground,[END]
the,dogs,were,at,him,at,once,tearing,chunks,of,flesh,off,his,bones,[END]
arya,heard,one,of,the,riders,laugh,[END]
here's,your,new,castle,you,bloody,lannister,bastard,he,said,[END]

you'll,rot,in,them,cages,his,captor,was,shouting,[END]
the,crows,will,be,picking,out,your,eyes,while,we're,spending,all,that,good,lannister,gold,o',yours,[END]

the,sword,of,the,morning,still,hung,in,the,south,the,bright,white,star,in,its,hilt,blazing,like,a,diamond,in,the,dawn,but,the,blacks,and,greys,of,the,darkling,forest,were,turning,once,again,to,greens,and,golds,reds,and,russets,[END]
and,above,the,soldier,pines,and,oaks,and,ash,and,sentinels,stood,the,wall,the,ice,pale,and,glimmering,beneath,the,dust,and,dirt,that,pocked,its,surface,[END]
the,magnar,sent,a,dozen,men,riding,west,and,a,dozen,more,east,to,climb,the,highest,hills,they,could,find,and,watch,for,any,sign,of,rangers,in,the,wood,or,riders,on,the,high,ice,[END]

the,other,wildlings,fell,in,behind,jarl,jon,and,ygritte,with,the,rest,[END]
this,was,to,be,the,young,raider's,hour,of,glory,[END]
the,wall,was,often,said,to,stand,seven,hundred,feet,high,but,jarl,had,found,a,place,where,it,was,both,higher,and,lower,[END]
before,them,the,ice,rose,sheer,from,out,of,the,trees,like,some,immense,cliff,crowned,by,wind-carved,battlements,that,loomed,at,least,eight,hundred,feet,high,perhaps,nine,hundred,in,spots,[END]
but,that,was,deceptive,jon,realized,as,they,drew,closer,[END]
brandon,the,builder,had,laid,his,huge,foundation,blocks,along,the,heights,wherever,feasible,and,hereabouts,the,hills,rose,wild,and,rugged,[END]
he,had,once,heard,his,uncle,benjen,say,that,the,wall,was,a,sword,east,of,castle,black,but,a,snake,to,the,west,[END]
it,was,true,[END]
sweeping,in,over,one,huge,humped,hill,the,ice,dipped,down,into,a,valley,climbed,the,knife,edge,of,a,long,granite,ridgeline,for,a,league,or,more,ran,along,a,jagged,crest,dipped,again,into,a,valley,deeper,still,and,then,rose,higher,and,higher,leaping,from,hill,to,hill,as,far,as,the,eye,could,see,into,the,mountainous,west,[END]
jarl,had,chosen,to,assault,the,stretch,of,ice,along,the,ridge,[END]
here,though,the,top,of,the,wall,loomed,eight,hundred,feet,above,the,forest,floor,a,good,third,of,that,height,was,earth,and,stone,rather,than,ice,the,slope,was,too,steep,for,their,horses,almost,as,difficult,a,scramble,as,the,fist,of,the,first,men,but,still,vastly,easier,to,ascend,than,the,sheer,vertical,face,of,the,wall,itself,[END]
and,the,ridge,was,densely,wooded,as,well,offering,easy,concealment,[END]
once,brothers,in,black,had,gone,out,every,day,with,axes,to,cut,back,the,encroaching,trees,but,those,days,were,long,past,and,here,the,forest,grew,right,up,to,the,ice,[END]
the,day,promised,to,be,damp,and,cold,and,damper,and,colder,by,the,wall,beneath,those,tons,of,ice,[END]
the,closer,they,got,the,more,the,thenns,held,back,[END]
they,have,never,seen,the,wall,before,not,even,the,magnar,jon,realized,[END]
it,frightens,them,[END]
in,the,seven,kingdoms,it,was,said,that,the,wall,marked,the,end,of,the,world,[END]
that,is,true,for,them,as,well,[END]
it,was,all,in,where,you,stood,[END]
and,where,do,i,stand,[END]
jon,did,not,know,[END]
to,stay,with,ygritte,he,would,need,to,become,a,wildling,heart,and,soul,[END]
if,he,abandoned,her,to,return,to,his,duty,the,magnar,might,cut,her,heart,out,[END]
and,if,he,took,her,with,him,[END]
assuming,she,would,go,which,was,far,from,certain,[END]

a,deserter,and,a,wildling,could,expect,no,welcome,anywhere,in,the,seven,kingdoms,[END]
we,could,go,look,for,gendel's,children,i,suppose,[END]
though,they'd,be,more,like,to,eat,us,than,to,take,us,in,[END]
the,wall,did,not,awe,jarl's,raiders,jon,saw,[END]
they,have,done,this,before,every,man,of,them,[END]
jarl,called,out,names,when,they,dismounted,beneath,the,ridge,and,eleven,gathered,round,him,[END]
all,were,young,[END]
the,oldest,could,not,have,been,more,than,five-and-twenty,and,two,of,the,ten,were,younger,than,jon,[END]
every,one,was,lean,and,hard,though,they,had,a,look,of,sinewy,strength,that,reminded,him,of,stonesnake,the,brother,the,halfhand,had,sent,off,afoot,when,rattleshirt,was,hunting,them,[END]
in,the,very,shadow,of,the,wall,the,wildlings,made,ready,winding,thick,coils,of,hempen,rope,around,one,shoulder,and,down,across,their,chests,and,lacing,on,queer,boots,of,supple,doeskin,[END]
the,boots,had,spikes,jutting,from,the,toes,iron,for,jarl,and,two,others,bronze,for,some,but,most,often,jagged,bone,[END]
small,stone-headed,hammers,hung,from,one,hip,a,leathern,bag,of,stakes,from,the,other,[END]

southron,swords,of,castle-forged,steel,[END]
and,your,name,in,the,song,he'll,make,of,this,that,too,[END]
what,more,could,a,free,man,ask,[END]
up,and,the,others,take,the,hindmost,[END]
the,others,take,them,all,thought,jon,as,he,watched,them,scramble,up,the,steep,slope,of,the,ridge,and,vanish,beneath,the,trees,[END]
it,would,not,be,the,first,time,wildlings,had,scaled,the,wall,not,even,the,hundred,and,first,[END]
the,patrols,stumbled,on,climbers,two,or,three,times,a,year,and,rangers,sometimes,came,on,the,broken,corpses,of,those,who,had,fallen,[END]
along,the,east,coast,the,raiders,most,often,built,boats,to,slip,across,the,bay,of,seals,[END]

but,in,between,the,only,way,to,defeat,the,wall,was,to,go,over,it,and,many,a,raider,had,[END]
fewer,come,back,though,he,thought,with,a,certain,grim,pride,[END]
climbers,must,of,necessity,leave,their,mounts,behind,and,many,younger,greener,raiders,began,by,taking,the,first,horses,they,found,[END]
then,a,hue,and,cry,would,go,up,ravens,would,fly,and,as,often,as,not,the,night's,watch,would,hunt,them,down,and,hang,them,before,they,could,get,back,with,their,plunder,and,stolen,women,[END]
jarl,would,not,make,that,mistake,jon,knew,but,he,wondered,about,styr,[END]
the,magnar,is,a,ruler,not,a,raider,[END]
he,may,not,know,how,the,game,is,played,[END]
there,they,are,ygritte,said,and,jon,glanced,up,to,see,the,first,climber,emerge,above,the,treetops,[END]
it,was,jarl,[END]
he,had,found,a,sentinel,tree,that,leaned,against,the,wall,and,led,his,men,up,the,trunk,to,get,a,quicker,start,[END]
the,wood,should,never,have,been,allowed,to,creep,so,close,[END]
they're,three,hundred,feet,up,and,they,haven't,touched,the,ice,itself,yet,[END]
he,watched,the,wildling,move,carefully,from,wood,to,wall,hacking,out,a,handhold,with,short,sharp,blows,of,his,ice,axe,then,swinging,over,[END]
the,rope,around,his,waist,tied,him,to,the,second,man,in,line,still,edging,up,the,tree,[END]
step,by,slow,step,jarl,moved,higher,kicking,out,toeholds,with,his,spiked,boots,when,there,were,no,natural,ones,to,be,found,[END]
when,he,was,ten,feet,above,the,sentinel,he,stopped,upon,a,narrow,icy,ledge,slung,his,axe,from,his,belt,took,out,his,hammer,and,drove,an,iron,stake,into,a,cleft,[END]
the,second,man,moved,onto,the,wall,behind,him,while,the,third,was,scrambling,to,the,top,of,the,tree,[END]
the,other,two,teams,had,no,happily,placed,trees,to,give,them,a,leg,up,and,before,long,the,thenns,were,wondering,whether,they,had,gotten,lost,climbing,the,ridge,[END]
jarl's,party,were,all,on,the,wall,and,eighty,feet,up,before,the,leading,climbers,from,the,other,groups,came,into,view,[END]
the,teams,were,spaced,a,good,twenty,yards,apart,[END]
jarl's,four,were,in,the,center,[END]
to,the,right,of,them,was,a,team,headed,up,by,grigg,the,goat,whose,long,blond,braid,made,him,easy,to,spot,from,below,[END]
to,the,left,a,very,thin,man,named,errok,led,the,climbers,[END]
so,slow,the,magnar,complained,loudly,as,he,watched,them,edge,their,way,upward,[END]
has,he,forgotten,the,crows,[END]
he,should,climb,faster,afore,we,are,discovered,[END]
jon,had,to,hold,his,tongue,[END]
he,remembered,the,skirling,pass,all,too,well,and,the,moonlight,climb,he'd,made,with,stonesnake,[END]
he,had,swallowed,his,heart,a,half-dozen,times,that,night,and,by,the,end,his,arms,and,legs,had,been,aching,and,his,fingers,were,half,frozen,[END]
and,that,was,stone,not,ice,[END]
stone,was,solid,[END]
ice,was,treacherous,stuff,at,the,best,of,times,and,on,a,day,like,this,when,the,wall,was,weeping,the,warmth,of,a,climber's,hand,might,be,enough,to,melt,it,[END]
the,huge,blocks,could,be,frozen,rock-hard,inside,but,their,outer,surface,would,be,slick,with,runnels,of,water,trickling,down,and,patches,of,rotten,ice,where,the,air,had,gotten,in,[END]
whatever,else,the,wildlings,are,they're,brave,[END]
all,the,same,jon,found,himself,hoping,that,styr's,fears,proved,well,founded,[END]
if,the,gods,are,good,a,patrol,will,chance,by,and,put,an,end,to,this,[END]
no,wall,can,keep,you,safe,his,father,had,told,him,once,as,they,walked,the,walls,of,winterfall,[END]
a,wall,is,only,as,strong,as,the,men,who,defend,it,[END]
the,wildlings,might,have,a,hundred,and,twenty,men,but,four,defenders,would,be,enough,to,see,them,off,with,a,few,well-placed,arrows,and,perhaps,a,pail,of,stones,[END]
no,defenders,appeared,however,not,four,not,even,one,[END]
the,sun,climbed,the,sky,and,the,wildlings,climbed,the,wall,[END]
jarl's,four,remained,well,ahead,till,noon,when,they,hit,a,pitch,of,bad,ice,[END]
jarl,had,looped,his,rope,around,a,wind-carved,pinnace,and,was,using,it,to,support,his,weight,when,the,whole,jagged,thing,suddenly,crumbled,and,came,crashing,down,and,him,with,it,[END]
chunks,of,ice,as,big,as,a,man's,head,bombarded,the,three,below,but,they,clung,to,the,handholds,and,the,stakes,held,and,jarl,jerked,to,a,sudden,halt,at,the,end,of,the,rope,[END]
by,the,time,his,team,had,recovered,from,that,mischance,grigg,the,goat,had,almost,drawn,even,with,them,[END]
errok's,four,remained,well,behind,[END]
the,face,where,they,were,climbing,looked,smooth,and,unpitted,covered,with,a,sheet,of,icemelt,that,glistened,wetly,where,the,sun,brushed,it,[END]
grigg's,section,was,darker,to,the,eye,with,more,obvious,features,long,horizontal,ledges,where,a,block,had,been,imperfectly,positioned,atop,the,block,below,cracks,and,crevices,even,chimneys,along,the,vertical,joins,where,wind,and,water,had,eaten,holes,large,enough,for,a,man,to,hide,in,[END]
jarl,soon,had,his,men,edging,upward,again,[END]
his,four,and,grigg's,moved,almost,side,by,side,with,errok's,fifty,feet,below,[END]
deerhorn,axes,chopped,and,hacked,sending,showers,of,glittery,shards,cascading,down,onto,the,trees,[END]
stone,hammers,pounded,stakes,deep,into,the,ice,to,serve,as,anchors,for,the,ropes,the,iron,stakes,ran,out,before,they,were,halfway,up,and,after,that,the,climbers,used,horn,and,sharpened,bone,[END]
and,the,men,kicked,driving,the,spikes,on,their,boots,against,the,hard,unyielding,ice,again,and,again,and,again,and,again,to,make,one,foothold,[END]
their,legs,must,be,numb,jon,thought,by,the,fourth,hour,[END]
how,long,can,they,keep,on,with,that,[END]
he,watched,as,restless,as,the,magnar,listening,for,the,distant,moan,of,a,thenn,warhorn,[END]
but,the,horns,stayed,silent,and,there,was,no,sign,of,the,night's,watch,[END]
by,the,sixth,hour,jarl,had,moved,ahead,of,grigg,the,goat,again,and,his,men,were,widening,the,gap,[END]
the,mance's,pet,must,want,a,sword,the,magnar,said,shading,his,eyes,[END]
the,sun,was,high,in,the,sky,and,the,upper,third,of,the,wall,was,a,crystalline,blue,from,below,reflecting,so,brilliantly,that,it,hurt,the,eyes,to,look,on,it,[END]
jarl's,four,and,grigg's,were,all,but,lost,in,the,glare,though,errok's,team,was,still,in,shadow,[END]
instead,of,moving,upward,they,were,edging,their,way,sideways,at,about,five,hundred,feet,making,for,a,chimney,[END]
jon,was,watching,them,inch,along,when,he,heard,the,sound,a,sudden,crack,that,seemed,to,roll,along,the,ice,followed,by,a,shout,of,alarm,[END]
and,then,the,air,was,full,of,shards,and,shrieks,and,falling,men,as,a,sheet,of,ice,a,foot,thick,and,fifty,feet,square,broke,off,from,the,wall,and,came,tumbling,crumbling,rumbling,sweeping,all,before,it,[END]
even,down,at,the,foot,of,the,ridge,some,chunks,came,spinning,through,the,trees,and,rolling,down,the,slope,[END]

and,when,they,looked,up,jarl,and,his,team,were,gone,[END]
men,ropes,stakes,all,gone,nothing,remained,above,six,hundred,feet,[END]
there,was,a,wound,in,the,wall,where,the,climbers,had,clung,half,a,heartbeat,before,the,ice,within,as,smooth,and,white,as,polished,marble,and,shining,in,the,sun,[END]
far,far,below,there,was,a,faint,red,smear,where,someone,had,smashed,against,a,frozen,pinnace,[END]

the,dead,were,burning,when,grigg,the,goat,reached,the,top,of,the,wall,[END]
by,the,time,errok's,four,had,joined,them,nothing,remained,of,jarl,and,his,team,but,bone,and,ash,[END]

we,will,die,together,as,we,were,born,together,[END]

i,never,dreamed,how,quick,the,sweet,would,turn,to,sour,[END]

willem's,twin,martyn,had,been,taken,captive,by,robb,stark,as,well,and,their,elder,brother,lancel,was,still,abed,beset,by,an,ulcerating,wound,that,would,not,heal,[END]

lord,tywin,had,always,relied,on,his,brother,but,now,he,had,no,choice,but,to,turn,again,to,his,dwarf,son,[END]
the,cost,of,rebuilding,was,going,to,be,ruinous,but,there,was,no,help,for,that,[END]
king's,landing,was,the,realm's,principal,harbor,rivaled,only,by,oldtown,[END]
the,river,had,to,be,reopened,and,the,sooner,the,better,[END]
and,where,am,i,going,to,find,the,bloody,coin,[END]
it,was,almost,enough,to,make,him,miss,littlefinger,who,had,sailed,north,a,fortnight,past,[END]
while,he,beds,lysa,arryn,and,rules,the,vale,beside,her,i,get,to,clean,up,the,mess,he,left,behind,him,[END]
though,at,least,his,father,was,giving,him,significant,work,to,do,[END]
he,won't,name,me,heir,to,casterly,rock,but,he'll,make,use,of,me,wherever,he,can,tyrion,thought,as,a,captain,of,gold,cloaks,waved,them,through,the,mud,gate,[END]
the,three,whores,still,dominated,the,market,square,inside,the,gate,but,they,stood,idle,now,and,the,boulders,and,barrels,of,pitch,had,all,been,trundled,away,[END]
there,were,children,climbing,the,towering,wooden,structures,swarming,up,like,monkeys,in,roughspun,to,perch,on,the,throwing,arms,and,hoot,at,each,other,[END]
remind,me,to,tell,ser,addam,to,post,some,gold,cloaks,here,tyrion,told,bronn,as,they,rode,between,two,of,the,trebuchets,[END]
some,fool,boy's,like,to,fall,off,and,break,his,back,[END]
there,was,a,shout,from,above,and,a,clod,of,manure,exploded,on,the,ground,a,foot,in,front,of,them,[END]
tyrion's,mare,reared,and,almost,threw,him,[END]
on,second,thoughts,he,said,when,he,had,the,horse,in,hand,let,the,poxy,brats,splatter,on,the,cobbles,like,overripe,melons,[END]
he,was,in,a,black,mood,and,not,just,because,a,few,street,urchins,wanted,to,pelt,him,with,dung,[END]
his,marriage,was,a,daily,agony,[END]
sansa,stark,remained,a,maiden,and,half,the,castle,seemed,to,know,it,[END]
when,they,had,saddled,up,this,morning,he'd,heard,two,of,the,stableboys,sniggering,behind,his,back,[END]
he,could,almost,imagine,that,the,horses,were,sniggering,as,well,[END]
he'd,risked,his,skin,to,avoid,the,bedding,ritual,hoping,to,preserve,the,privacy,of,his,bedchamber,but,that,hope,had,been,dashed,quick,enough,[END]
either,sansa,had,been,stupid,enough,to,confide,in,one,of,her,bedmaids,every,one,of,whom,was,a,spy,for,cersei,or,varys,and,his,little,birds,were,to,blame,[END]
what,difference,did,it,make,[END]
they,were,laughing,at,him,all,the,same,[END]
the,only,person,in,the,red,keep,who,didn't,seem,to,find,his,marriage,a,source,of,amusement,was,his,lady,wife,[END]
sansa's,misery,was,deepening,every,day,[END]
tyrion,would,gladly,have,broken,through,her,courtesy,to,give,her,what,solace,he,might,but,it,was,no,good,[END]
no,words,would,ever,make,him,fair,in,her,eyes,[END]
or,any,less,a,lannister,[END]
this,was,the,wife,they,had,given,him,for,all,the,rest,of,his,life,and,she,hated,him,[END]
and,their,nights,together,in,the,great,bed,were,another,source,of,torment,[END]
he,could,no,longer,bear,to,sleep,naked,as,had,been,his,custom,[END]
his,wife,was,too,well,trained,ever,to,say,an,unkind,word,but,the,revulsion,in,her,eyes,whenever,she,looked,on,his,body,was,more,than,he,could,bear,[END]
tyrion,had,commanded,sansa,to,wear,a,sleeping,shift,as,well,[END]
i,want,her,he,realized,[END]
i,want,winterfell,yes,but,i,want,her,as,well,child,or,woman,or,whatever,she,is,[END]
i,want,to,comfort,her,[END]
i,want,to,hear,her,laugh,[END]

in,those,days,his,father,had,been,aerys's,hand,and,many,people,said,that,lord,tywin,lannister,ruled,the,seven,kingdoms,but,lady,joanna,ruled,lord,tywin,[END]
he,was,not,the,same,man,after,she,died,imp,his,uncle,gery,told,him,once,[END]
the,best,part,of,him,died,with,her,[END]
gerion,had,been,the,youngest,of,lord,tytos,lannister's,four,sons,and,the,uncle,tyrion,liked,best,[END]
but,he,was,gone,now,lost,beyond,the,seas,and,tyrion,himself,had,put,lady,joanna,in,her,grave,[END]
did,you,find,casterly,rock,to,your,liking,my,lord,[END]

your,father,ignored,us,the,whole,time,we,were,there,after,commanding,ser,kevan,to,see,to,our,entertainment,[END]

your,skies,were,too,grey,your,wines,too,sweet,your,women,too,chaste,your,food,too,bland,[END]

two,ibbenese,rushed,through,the,door,with,shaggy,brown,shields,held,high,before,them,and,behind,them,came,a,dothraki,with,a,great,curved,arakh,and,bells,in,his,braid,and,behind,him,three,volantene,sellswords,covered,with,fierce,tattoos,[END]

from,out,of,the,ditches,and,trees,the,rest,of,his,band,came,pouring,steel,in,hand,[END]

the,red,priest,hacked,at,a,hide,shield,until,it,flew,to,pieces,while,his,horse,kicked,the,man,in,the,face,[END]

she,spied,ned,too,fighting,at,the,lightning,lord's,side,[END]
it's,not,fair,he's,only,a,little,older,than,me,they,should,have,let,me,fight,[END]
the,battle,did,not,last,very,long,[END]
the,brave,companions,still,on,their,feet,soon,died,or,threw,down,their,swords,[END]
two,of,the,dothraki,managed,to,regain,their,horses,and,flee,but,only,because,lord,beric,let,them,go,[END]

he,shook,the,bars,kicked,shoved,against,them,and,rattled,them,and,punched,the,hinges,with,a,huge,hand,until,the,air,was,filled,with,flakes,of,rust,but,the,iron,door,would,not,budge,[END]

jon,thought,it,might,have,been,the,same,man,who'd,found,him,outside,the,cave,the,night,before,they,climbed,the,wall,but,he,could,not,be,sure,[END]
he,got,to,his,feet,[END]
ygritte,came,with,him,which,always,made,styr,frown,but,whenever,he,tried,to,dismiss,her,she,would,remind,him,that,she,was,a,free,woman,not,a,kneeler,[END]
she,came,and,went,as,she,pleased,[END]
they,found,the,magnar,standing,beneath,the,tree,that,grew,through,the,floor,of,the,common,room,[END]
his,captive,knelt,before,the,hearth,encircled,by,wooden,spears,and,bronze,swords,[END]
he,watched,jon,approach,but,did,not,speak,[END]
the,rain,was,running,down,the,walls,and,pattering,against,the,last,few,leaves,that,still,clung,to,the,tree,while,smoke,swirled,thick,from,the,fire,[END]
he,must,die,styr,the,magnar,said,[END]
do,it,crow,[END]
the,old,man,said,no,word,[END]
he,only,looked,at,jon,standing,amongst,the,wildlings,[END]
amidst,the,rain,and,smoke,lit,only,by,the,fire,he,could,not,have,seen,that,jon,was,all,in,black,but,for,his,sheepskin,cloak,[END]
or,could,he,[END]
jon,drew,longclaw,from,its,sheath,[END]
rain,washed,the,steel,and,the,firelight,traced,a,sullen,orange,line,along,the,edge,[END]
such,a,small,fire,to,cost,a,man,his,life,[END]
he,remembered,what,qhorin,halfhand,had,said,when,they,spied,the,fire,in,the,skirling,pass,[END]
fire,is,life,up,here,he,told,them,but,it,can,be,death,as,well,[END]
that,was,high,in,the,frostfangs,though,in,the,lawless,wild,beyond,the,wall,[END]
this,was,the,gift,protected,by,the,night's,watch,and,the,power,of,winterfell,[END]
a,man,should,have,been,free,to,build,a,fire,here,without,dying,for,it,[END]
why,do,you,hesitate,[END]
styr,said,[END]
kill,him,and,be,done,[END]
even,then,the,captive,did,not,speak,[END]

he,might,have,said,a,thousand,things,or,wept,or,called,upon,his,gods,[END]
no,words,would,save,him,now,though,[END]
perhaps,he,knew,that,[END]
so,he,held,his,tongue,and,looked,at,jon,in,accusation,and,appeal,[END]
you,must,not,balk,whatever,is,asked,of,you,[END]
ride,with,them,eat,with,them,fight,with,them,[END]
but,this,old,man,had,offered,no,resistance,[END]
he,had,been,unlucky,that,was,all,[END]
who,he,was,where,he,came,from,where,he,meant,to,go,on,his,sorry,sway-backed,horse,[END]
none,of,it,mattered,[END]
he,is,an,old,man,jon,told,himself,[END]
fifty,maybe,even,sixty,[END]
he,lived,a,longer,life,than,most,[END]
the,thenns,will,kill,him,anyway,nothing,i,can,say,or,do,will,save,him,[END]
longclaw,seemed,heavier,than,lead,in,his,hand,too,heavy,to,lift,[END]
the,man,kept,staring,at,him,with,eyes,as,big,and,black,as,wells,[END]
i,will,fall,into,those,eyes,and,drown,[END]
the,magnar,was,looking,at,him,too,and,he,could,almost,taste,the,mistrust,[END]

what,matter,if,it,is,my,hand,that,slays,him,[END]

like,ice,[END]

do,it,jon,snow,ygritte,urged,[END]

three,quick,strides,and,she,yanked,the,old,man's,head,back,by,the,hair,and,opened,his,throat,from,ear,to,ear,[END]
even,in,death,the,man,did,not,cry,out,[END]
you,know,nothing,jon,snow,[END]
she,shouted,at,him,and,flung,the,bloody,blade,at,his,feet,[END]
the,magnar,said,something,in,the,old,tongue,[END]
he,might,have,been,telling,the,thenns,to,kill,jon,where,he,stood,but,he,would,never,know,the,truth,of,that,[END]
lightning,crashed,down,from,the,sky,a,searing,blue-white,bolt,that,touched,the,top,of,the,tower,in,the,lake,[END]
they,could,smell,the,fury,of,it,and,when,the,thunder,came,it,seemed,to,shake,the,night,[END]
and,death,leapt,down,amongst,them,[END]
the,lightning,flash,left,jon,night-blind,but,he,glimpsed,the,hurtling,shadow,half,a,heartbeat,before,he,heard,the,shriek,[END]
the,first,thenn,died,as,the,old,man,had,blood,gushing,from,his,torn,throat,[END]
then,the,light,was,gone,and,the,shape,was,spinning,away,snarling,and,another,man,went,down,in,the,dark,[END]
there,were,curses,shouts,howls,of,pain,[END]
jon,saw,big,boil,stumble,backward,and,knock,down,three,men,behind,him,[END]

ghost,leapt,the,wall,[END]
then,the,lightning,turned,the,night,to,day,and,he,saw,the,wolf,standing,on,del's,chest,blood,running,black,from,his,jaws,[END]
grey,[END]
he's,grey,[END]
darkness,descended,with,the,thunderclap,[END]
the,thenns,were,jabbing,with,their,spears,as,the,wolf,darted,between,them,[END]
the,old,man's,mare,reared,maddened,by,the,smell,of,slaughter,and,lashed,out,with,her,hooves,[END]
longclaw,was,still,in,his,hand,[END]
all,at,once,jon,snow,knew,he,would,never,get,a,better,chance,[END]
he,cut,down,the,first,man,as,he,turned,toward,the,wolf,shoved,past,a,second,slashed,at,a,third,[END]
through,the,madness,he,heard,someone,call,his,name,but,whether,it,was,ygritte,or,the,magnar,he,could,not,say,[END]
the,thenn,fighting,to,control,the,horse,never,saw,him,[END]
longclaw,was,feather-light,[END]
he,swung,at,the,back,of,the,man's,calf,and,felt,the,steel,bite,down,to,the,bone,[END]
when,the,wildling,fell,the,mare,bolted,but,somehow,jon,managed,to,grab,her,mane,with,his,off,hand,and,vault,himself,onto,her,back,[END]

the,horse,reared,lashing,out,[END]
one,hoof,caught,a,thenn,in,the,temple,with,a,crunch,[END]
and,then,they,were,running,[END]
jon,made,no,effort,to,guide,the,horse,[END]
it,was,all,he,could,do,to,stay,on,her,as,they,plunged,through,mud,and,rain,and,thunder,[END]
wet,grass,whipped,at,his,face,and,a,spear,flew,past,his,ear,[END]
if,the,horse,stumbles,and,breaks,a,leg,they,will,run,me,down,and,kill,me,he,thought,but,the,old,gods,were,with,him,and,the,horse,did,not,stumble,[END]
lightning,shivered,through,the,black,dome,of,sky,and,thunder,rolled,across,the,plains,[END]
the,shouts,dwindled,and,died,behind,him,[END]
long,hours,later,the,rain,stopped,[END]
jon,found,himself,alone,in,a,sea,of,tall,black,grass,[END]
there,was,a,deep,throbbing,ache,in,his,right,thigh,[END]
when,he,looked,down,he,was,surprised,to,see,an,arrow,jutting,out,the,back,of,it,[END]
when,did,that,happen,[END]
he,grabbed,hold,of,the,shaft,and,gave,it,a,tug,but,the,arrowhead,was,sunk,deep,in,the,meat,of,his,leg,and,the,pain,when,he,pulled,on,it,was,excruciating,[END]
he,tried,to,think,back,on,the,madness,at,the,inn,but,all,he,could,remember,was,the,beast,gaunt,and,grey,and,terrible,[END]
it,was,too,large,to,be,a,common,wolf,[END]
a,direwolf,then,[END]
it,had,to,be,[END]
he,had,never,seen,an,animal,move,so,fast,[END]
like,a,grey,wind,[END]
could,robb,have,returned,to,the,north,[END]
jon,shook,his,head,[END]
he,had,no,answers,[END]
it,was,too,hard,to,think,[END]
about,the,wolf,the,old,man,ygritte,any,of,it,[END]
clumsily,he,slid,down,off,the,mare's,back,[END]
his,wounded,leg,buckled,under,him,and,he,had,to,swallow,a,scream,[END]
this,is,going,to,be,agony,[END]
the,arrow,had,to,come,out,though,and,nothing,good,could,come,of,waiting,[END]
jon,curled,his,hand,around,the,fletching,took,a,deep,breath,and,shoved,the,arrow,forward,[END]
he,grunted,then,cursed,[END]
it,hurt,so,much,he,had,to,stop,[END]
i,am,bleeding,like,a,butchered,pig,he,thought,but,there,was,nothing,to,be,done,for,it,until,the,arrow,was,out,[END]
he,grimaced,and,tried,again,[END]
and,soon,stopped,again,trembling,[END]
once,more,[END]
this,time,he,screamed,but,when,he,was,done,the,arrowhead,was,poking,through,the,front,of,his,thigh,[END]
jon,pushed,back,his,bloody,breeches,to,get,a,better,grip,grimaced,and,slowly,drew,the,shaft,through,his,leg,[END]
how,he,got,through,that,without,fainting,he,never,knew,[END]
he,lay,on,the,ground,afterward,clutching,his,prize,and,bleeding,quietly,too,weak,to,move,[END]
after,a,while,he,realized,that,if,he,did,not,make,himself,move,he,was,like,to,bleed,to,death,[END]
jon,crawled,to,the,shallow,stream,where,the,mare,was,drinking,washed,his,thigh,in,the,cold,water,and,bound,it,tight,with,a,strip,of,cloth,torn,from,his,cloak,[END]
he,washed,the,arrow,too,turning,it,in,his,hands,[END]
was,the,fletching,grey,or,white,[END]

did,she,loose,a,shaft,at,me,as,i,fled,[END]
jon,could,not,blame,her,for,that,[END]
he,wondered,if,she'd,been,aiming,for,him,or,the,horse,[END]
if,the,mare,had,gone,down,he,would,have,been,doomed,[END]
a,lucky,thing,my,leg,got,in,the,way,he,muttered,[END]
he,rested,for,a,while,to,let,the,horse,graze,[END]
she,did,not,wander,far,[END]
that,was,good,[END]
hobbled,with,a,bad,leg,he,could,never,have,caught,her,[END]
it,was,all,he,could,do,to,force,himself,back,to,his,feet,and,climb,onto,her,back,[END]
how,did,i,ever,mount,her,before,without,saddle,or,stirrups,and,a,sword,in,one,hand,[END]
that,was,another,question,he,could,not,answer,[END]
thunder,rumbled,softly,in,the,distance,but,above,him,the,clouds,were,breaking,up,[END]

daenerys,[END]
her,dothraki,scouts,had,told,her,how,it,was,but,dany,wanted,to,see,for,herself,[END]

i'd,say,so,[END]
ser,jorah,pointed,[END]

about,five,hundred,men,apiece,[END]
see,the,banners,[END]

easily,ser,jorah,said,[END]

the,slavers,like,to,talk,she,said,[END]

and,invite,the,captains,of,the,sellsword,companies,to,call,on,me,as,well,[END]
but,not,together,[END]
the,stormcrows,at,midday,the,second,sons,two,hours,later,[END]
as,you,wish,ser,jorah,said,[END]
but,if,they,do,not,come,[END]
they'll,come,[END]
they,will,be,curious,to,see,the,dragons,and,hear,what,i,might,have,to,say,and,the,clever,ones,will,see,it,for,a,chance,to,gauge,my,strength,[END]
she,wheeled,her,silver,mare,about,[END]
i'll,await,them,in,my,pavilion,[END]
slate,skies,and,brisk,winds,saw,dany,back,to,her,host,[END]
the,deep,ditch,that,would,encircle,her,camp,was,already,half,dug,and,the,woods,were,full,of,unsullied,lopping,branches,off,birch,trees,to,sharpen,into,stakes,[END]
the,eunuchs,could,not,sleep,in,an,unfortified,camp,or,so,grey,worm,insisted,[END]
he,was,there,watching,the,work,[END]
dany,halted,a,moment,to,speak,with,him,[END]
yunkai,has,girded,up,her,loins,for,battle,[END]
this,is,good,your,grace,[END]
these,ones,thirst,for,blood,[END]
when,she,had,commanded,the,unsullied,to,choose,officers,from,amongst,themselves,grey,worm,had,been,their,overwhelming,choice,for,the,highest,rank,[END]
dany,had,put,ser,jorah,over,him,to,train,him,for,command,and,the,exile,knight,said,that,so,far,the,young,eunuch,was,hard,but,fair,quick,to,learn,tireless,and,utterly,unrelenting,in,his,attention,to,detail,[END]
the,wise,masters,have,assembled,a,slave,army,to,meet,us,[END]
a,slave,in,yunkai,learns,the,way,of,seven,sighs,and,the,sixteen,seats,of,pleasure,your,grace,[END]
the,unsullied,learn,the,way,of,the,three,spears,[END]
your,grey,worm,hopes,to,show,you,[END]
one,of,the,first,things,dany,had,done,after,the,fall,of,astapor,was,abolish,the,custom,of,giving,the,unsullied,new,slave,names,every,day,[END]
most,of,those,born,free,had,returned,to,their,birth,names,those,who,still,remembered,them,at,least,[END]
others,had,called,themselves,after,heroes,or,gods,and,sometimes,weapons,gems,and,even,flowers,which,resulted,in,soldiers,with,some,very,peculiar,names,to,dany's,ears,[END]
grey,worm,had,remained,grey,worm,[END]
when,she,asked,him,why,he,said,it,is,a,lucky,name,[END]
the,name,this,one,was,born,to,was,accursed,[END]
that,was,the,name,he,had,when,he,was,taken,for,a,slave,[END]
but,grey,worm,is,the,name,this,one,drew,the,day,daenerys,stormborn,set,him,free,[END]
if,battle,is,joined,let,grey,worm,show,wisdom,as,well,as,valor,dany,told,him,[END]
spare,any,slave,who,runs,or,throws,down,his,weapon,[END]
the,fewer,slain,the,more,remain,to,join,us,after,[END]
this,one,will,remember,[END]
i,know,he,will,[END]
be,at,my,tent,by,midday,[END]
i,want,you,there,with,my,other,officers,when,i,treat,with,the,sellsword,captains,[END]
dany,spurred,her,silver,on,to,camp,[END]
within,the,perimeter,the,unsullied,had,established,the,tents,were,going,up,in,orderly,rows,with,her,own,tall,golden,pavilion,at,the,center,[END]
a,second,encampment,lay,close,beyond,her,own,five,times,the,size,sprawling,and,chaotic,this,second,camp,had,no,ditches,no,tents,no,sentries,no,horselines,[END]
those,who,had,horses,or,mules,slept,beside,them,for,fear,they,might,be,stolen,[END]
goats,sheep,and,half-starved,dogs,wandered,freely,amongst,hordes,of,women,children,and,old,men,[END]
dany,had,left,astapor,in,the,hands,of,a,council,of,former,slaves,led,by,a,healer,a,scholar,and,a,priest,[END]
wise,men,all,she,thought,and,just,[END]
yet,even,so,tens,of,thousands,preferred,to,follow,her,to,yunkai,rather,than,remain,behind,in,astapor,[END]
i,gave,them,the,city,and,most,of,them,were,too,frightened,to,take,it,[END]
the,raggle-taggle,host,of,freedmen,dwarfed,her,own,but,they,were,more,burden,than,benefit,[END]
perhaps,one,in,a,hundred,had,a,donkey,a,camel,or,an,ox,most,carried,weapons,looted,from,some,slaver's,armory,but,only,one,in,ten,was,strong,enough,to,fight,and,none,was,trained,[END]
they,ate,the,land,bare,as,they,passed,like,locusts,in,sandals,[END]
yet,dany,could,not,bring,herself,to,abandon,them,as,ser,jorah,and,her,bloodriders,urged,[END]
i,told,them,they,were,free,[END]
i,cannot,tell,them,now,they,are,not,free,to,join,me,[END]
she,gazed,at,the,smoke,rising,from,their,cookfires,and,swallowed,a,sigh,[END]
she,might,have,the,best,footsoldiers,in,the,world,but,she,also,had,the,worst,[END]
arstan,whitebeard,stood,outside,the,entrance,of,her,tent,while,strong,belwas,sat,crosslegged,on,the,grass,nearby,eating,a,bowl,of,figs,[END]
on,the,march,the,duty,of,guarding,her,fell,upon,their,shoulders,[END]
she,had,made,jhogo,aggo,and,rakharo,her,kos,as,well,as,her,bloodriders,and,just,now,she,needed,them,more,to,command,her,dothraki,than,to,protect,her,person,[END]
her,khalasar,was,tiny,some,thirty-odd,mounted,warriors,and,most,of,them,braidless,boys,and,bentback,old,men,[END]
yet,they,were,all,the,horse,she,had,and,she,dared,not,go,without,them,[END]
the,unsullied,might,be,the,finest,infantry,in,all,the,world,as,ser,jorah,claimed,but,she,needed,scouts,and,outriders,as,well,[END]
yunkai,will,have,war,dany,told,whitebeard,inside,the,pavilion,[END]
irri,and,jhiqui,had,covered,the,floor,with,carpets,while,missandei,lit,a,stick,of,incense,to,sweeten,the,dusty,air,[END]

olyvar,frey,had,squired,for,robb,previously,and,would,doubtless,be,present,for,his,sister's,wedding,to,parade,his,replacement,before,him,would,be,as,unwise,as,it,was,unkind,[END]
