next,came,the,baggage,train,a,procession,of,wayns,laden,with,food,fodder,camp,supplies,wedding,gifts,and,the,wounded,too,weak,to,walk,under,the,watchful,eye,of,ser,wendel,manderly,and,his,white,harbor,knights,[END]
herds,of,sheep,and,goats,and,scrawny,cattle,trailed,behind,and,then,a,little,trail,of,footsore,camp,followers,[END]
even,farther,back,was,robin,flint,and,the,rearguard,[END]
there,was,no,enemy,in,back,of,them,for,hundreds,of,leagues,but,robb,would,take,no,chances,[END]
thirty-five,hundred,they,were,thirty-five,hundred,who,had,been,blooded,in,the,whispering,wood,who,had,reddened,their,swords,at,the,battle,of,the,camps,at,oxcross,ashemark,and,the,crag,and,all,through,the,gold-rich,hills,of,the,lannister,west,[END]
aside,from,her,brother,edmure's,modest,retinue,of,friends,the,lords,of,the,trident,had,remained,to,hold,the,riverlands,while,the,king,retook,the,north,[END]
ahead,awaited,edmure's,bride,and,robb's,next,battle,[END]
and,for,me,two,dead,sons,an,empty,bed,and,a,castle,full,of,ghosts,[END]
it,was,a,cheerless,prospect,[END]
brienne,where,are,you,[END]
bring,my,girls,back,to,me,brienne,[END]
bring,them,back,safe,[END]
the,drizzle,that,had,sent,them,off,turned,into,a,soft,steady,rain,by,midday,and,continued,well,past,nightfall,[END]
the,next,day,the,northmen,never,saw,the,sun,at,all,but,rode,beneath,leaden,skies,with,their,hoods,pulled,up,to,keep,the,water,from,their,eyes,[END]
it,was,a,heavy,rain,turning,roads,to,mud,and,fields,to,quagmires,swelling,the,rivers,and,stripping,the,trees,of,their,leaves,[END]
the,constant,patter,made,idle,chatter,more,bother,than,it,was,worth,so,men,spoke,only,when,they,had,something,to,say,and,that,was,seldom,enough,[END]
we,are,stronger,than,we,seem,my,lady,lady,maege,mormont,said,as,they,rode,[END]
catelyn,had,grown,fond,of,lady,maege,and,her,eldest,daughter,dacey,they,were,more,understanding,than,most,in,the,matter,of,jaime,lannister,she,had,found,[END]
the,daughter,was,tall,and,lean,the,mother,short,and,stout,but,they,dressed,alike,in,mail,and,leather,with,the,black,bear,of,house,mormont,on,shield,and,surcoat,[END]
by,catelyn's,lights,that,was,queer,garb,for,a,lady,yet,dacey,and,lady,maege,seemed,more,comfortable,both,as,warriors,and,as,women,than,ever,the,girl,from,tarth,had,been,[END]
i,have,fought,beside,the,young,wolf,in,every,battle,dacey,mormont,said,cheerfully,[END]
he,has,not,lost,one,yet,[END]
no,but,he,has,lost,everything,else,catelyn,thought,but,it,would,not,do,to,say,it,aloud,[END]
the,northmen,did,not,lack,for,courage,but,they,were,far,from,home,with,little,enough,to,sustain,them,but,for,their,faith,in,their,young,king,[END]
that,faith,must,be,protected,at,all,costs,[END]
i,must,be,stronger,she,told,herself,[END]
i,must,be,strong,for,robb,[END]
if,i,despair,my,grief,will,consume,me,[END]
everything,would,turn,on,this,marriage,[END]
if,edmure,and,roslin,were,happy,in,one,another,if,the,late,lord,frey,could,be,appeased,and,his,power,once,more,wedded,to,robb's,[END]
even,then,what,chance,will,we,have,caught,between,lannister,and,greyjoy,[END]
it,was,a,question,catelyn,dared,not,dwell,on,though,robb,dwelt,on,little,else,[END]
she,saw,how,he,studied,his,maps,whenever,they,made,camp,searching,for,some,plan,that,might,win,back,the,north,[END]
her,brother,edmure,had,other,cares,[END]
you,don't,suppose,all,lord,walder's,daughters,look,like,him,do,you,[END]
he,wondered,as,he,sat,in,his,tall,striped,pavilion,with,catelyn,and,his,friends,[END]
with,so,many,different,mothers,a,few,of,the,maids,are,bound,to,turn,up,comely,said,ser,marq,piper,but,why,should,the,old,wretch,give,you,a,pretty,one,[END]
no,reason,at,all,said,edmure,in,a,glum,tone,[END]
it,was,more,than,catelyn,could,stand,[END]
cersei,lannister,is,comely,she,said,sharply,[END]
you'd,be,wiser,to,pray,that,roslin,is,strong,and,healthy,with,a,good,head,and,a,loyal,heart,[END]
and,with,that,she,left,them,[END]

the,next,day,he,avoided,her,entirely,on,the,march,preferring,the,company,of,marq,piper,lymond,goodbrook,patrek,mallister,and,the,young,vances,[END]
they,do,not,scold,him,except,in,jest,catelyn,told,herself,when,they,raced,by,her,that,afternoon,with,nary,a,word,[END]
i,have,always,been,too,hard,with,edmure,and,now,grief,sharpens,my,every,word,[END]
she,regretted,her,rebuke,[END]
there,was,rain,enough,falling,from,the,sky,without,her,making,more,[END]
and,was,it,really,such,a,terrible,thing,to,want,a,pretty,wife,[END]
she,remembered,her,own,childish,disappointment,the,first,time,she,had,laid,eyes,on,eddard,stark,[END]
she,had,pictured,him,as,a,younger,version,of,his,brother,brandon,but,that,was,wrong,[END]

he,spoke,courteously,enough,but,beneath,the,words,she,sensed,a,coolness,that,was,all,at,odds,with,brandon,whose,mirths,had,been,as,wild,as,his,rages,[END]
even,when,he,took,her,maidenhood,their,love,had,more,of,duty,to,it,than,of,passion,[END]
we,made,robb,that,night,though,we,made,a,king,together,[END]
and,after,the,war,at,winterfell,i,had,love,enough,for,any,woman,once,i,found,the,good,sweet,heart,beneath,ned's,solemn,face,[END]
there,is,no,reason,edmure,should,not,find,the,same,with,his,roslin,[END]
as,the,gods,would,have,it,their,route,took,them,through,the,whispering,wood,where,robb,had,won,his,first,great,victory,[END]

it,was,warmer,then,catelyn,remembered,the,trees,were,still,green,and,the,stream,did,not,overflow,its,banks,[END]

only,the,spruce,and,the,soldier,pines,still,showed,green,thrusting,up,at,the,belly,of,the,clouds,like,tall,dark,spears,[END]

we,have,needed,to,be,[END]
in,olden,days,the,ironmen,would,come,raiding,in,their,longboats,or,wildlings,from,the,frozen,shore,[END]
the,men,would,be,off,fishing,like,as,not,[END]
the,wives,they,left,behind,had,to,defend,themselves,and,their,children,or,else,be,carried,off,[END]
there's,a,carving,on,our,gate,said,dacey,[END]
a,woman,in,a,bearskin,with,a,child,in,one,arm,suckling,at,her,breast,[END]
in,the,other,hand,she,holds,a,battleaxe,[END]
she's,no,proper,lady,that,one,but,i,always,loved,her,[END]
my,nephew,jorah,brought,home,a,proper,lady,once,said,lady,maege,[END]
he,won,her,in,a,tourney,[END]
how,she,hated,that,carving,[END]
aye,and,all,the,rest,said,dacey,[END]
she,had,hair,like,spun,gold,that,lynesse,[END]
skin,like,cream,[END]
but,her,soft,hands,were,never,made,for,axes,[END]
nor,her,teats,for,giving,suck,her,mother,said,bluntly,[END]
catelyn,knew,of,whom,they,spoke,jorah,mormont,had,brought,his,second,wife,to,winterfell,for,feasts,and,once,they,had,guested,for,a,fortnight,[END]
she,remembered,how,young,the,lady,lynesse,had,been,how,fair,and,how,unhappy,[END]
one,night,after,several,cups,of,wine,she,had,confessed,to,catelyn,that,the,north,was,no,place,for,a,hightower,of,oldtown,[END]
there,was,a,tully,of,riverrun,who,felt,the,same,once,she,had,answered,gently,trying,to,console,but,in,time,she,found,much,here,she,could,love,[END]
all,lost,now,she,reflected,[END]
winterfell,and,ned,bran,and,rickon,sansa,arya,all,gone,[END]
only,robb,remains,[END]
had,there,been,too,much,of,lynesse,hightower,in,her,after,all,and,too,little,of,the,starks,[END]
would,that,i,had,known,how,to,wield,an,axe,perhaps,i,might,have,been,able,to,protect,them,better,[END]
day,followed,day,and,still,the,rain,kept,falling,[END]
all,the,way,up,the,blue,fork,they,rode,past,sevenstreams,where,the,river,unraveled,into,a,confusion,of,rills,and,brooks,then,through,hag's,mire,where,glistening,green,pools,waited,to,swallow,the,unwary,and,the,soft,ground,sucked,at,the,hooves,of,their,horses,like,a,hungry,babe,at,its,mother's,breast,[END]
the,going,was,worse,than,slow,[END]
half,the,wayns,had,to,be,abandoned,to,the,muck,their,loads,distributed,amongst,mules,and,draft,horses,[END]
lord,jason,mallister,caught,up,with,them,amidst,the,bogs,of,hag's,mire,[END]
there,was,more,than,an,hour,of,daylight,remaining,when,he,rode,up,with,his,column,but,robb,called,a,halt,at,once,and,ser,raynald,westerling,came,to,escort,catelyn,to,the,king's,tent,[END]
she,found,her,son,seated,beside,a,brazier,a,map,across,his,lap,[END]
grey,wind,slept,at,his,feet,[END]
the,greatjon,was,with,him,along,with,galbart,glover,maege,mormont,edmure,and,a,man,that,catelyn,did,not,know,a,fleshy,balding,man,with,a,cringing,look,to,him,[END]
no,lordling,this,one,she,knew,the,moment,she,laid,eyes,on,the,stranger,[END]
not,even,a,warrior,[END]
jason,mallister,rose,to,offer,catelyn,his,seat,[END]
his,hair,had,almost,as,much,white,in,it,as,brown,but,the,lord,of,seagard,was,still,a,handsome,man,tall,and,lean,with,a,chiseled,clean-shaven,face,high,cheekbones,and,fierce,blue-grey,eyes,[END]
lady,stark,it,is,ever,a,pleasure,[END]
i,bring,good,tidings,i,hope,[END]

your,creepers,best,come,fast,or,my,men,will,swarm,those,walls,and,win,the,moat,before,you,show,your,face,[END]

galbart,glover,rubbed,his,mouth,[END]

mother,[END]
she,tensed,[END]

samwell,[END]
whitetree,sam,thought,[END]
please,let,this,be,whitetree,[END]
he,remembered,whitetree,[END]
whitetree,was,on,the,maps,he'd,drawn,on,their,way,north,[END]
if,this,village,was,whitetree,he,knew,where,they,were,[END]
please,it,has,to,be,[END]
he,wanted,that,so,badly,that,he,forgot,his,feet,for,a,little,bit,he,forgot,the,ache,in,his,calves,and,his,lower,back,and,the,stiff,frozen,fingers,he,could,scarcely,feel,[END]
he,even,forgot,about,lord,mormont,and,craster,and,the,wights,and,the,others,[END]
whitetree,sam,prayed,to,any,god,that,might,be,listening,[END]
all,wildling,villages,looked,much,alike,though,[END]
a,huge,weirwood,grew,in,the,center,of,this,one,[END]
but,a,white,tree,did,not,mean,whitetree,necessarily,[END]
hadn't,the,weirwood,at,whitetree,been,bigger,than,this,one,[END]
maybe,he,was,remembering,it,wrong,[END]
the,face,carved,into,the,bone,pale,trunk,was,long,and,sad,red,tears,of,dried,sap,leaked,from,its,eyes,[END]
was,that,how,it,looked,when,we,came,north,[END]
sam,couldn't,recall,[END]
around,the,tree,stood,a,handful,of,one-room,hovels,with,sod,roofs,a,longhall,built,of,logs,and,grown,over,with,moss,a,stone,well,a,sheepfold,[END]
but,no,sheep,nor,any,people,[END]
the,wildlings,had,gone,to,join,mance,rayder,in,the,frostfangs,taking,all,they,owned,except,their,houses,[END]
sam,was,thankful,for,that,[END]
night,was,coming,on,and,it,would,be,good,to,sleep,beneath,a,roof,for,once,[END]
he,was,so,tired,[END]
it,seemed,as,though,he,had,been,walking,half,his,life,[END]
his,boots,were,falling,to,pieces,and,all,the,blisters,on,his,feet,had,burst,and,turned,to,callus,but,now,he,had,new,blisters,under,the,callus,and,his,toes,were,getting,frostbitten,[END]
but,it,was,either,walk,or,die,sam,knew,[END]
gilly,was,still,weak,from,childbirth,and,carrying,the,babe,besides,she,needed,the,horse,more,than,he,did,[END]
the,second,horse,had,died,on,them,three,days,out,from,craster's,keep,[END]
it,was,a,wonder,she,lasted,that,long,poor,half-starved,thing,[END]
sam's,weight,had,probably,done,for,her,[END]
they,might,have,tried,riding,double,but,he,was,afraid,the,same,thing,would,happen,again,[END]
it's,better,that,i,walk,[END]
sam,left,gilly,in,the,longhall,to,make,a,fire,while,he,poked,his,head,into,the,hovels,[END]
she,was,better,at,making,fires,he,could,never,seem,to,get,the,kindling,to,catch,and,the,last,time,he'd,tried,to,strike,a,spark,off,flint,and,steel,he,managed,to,cut,himself,on,his,knife,[END]
gilly,bound,up,the,gash,for,him,but,his,hand,was,stiff,and,sore,even,clumsier,than,it,had,been,before,[END]
he,knew,he,should,wash,the,wound,and,change,the,binding,but,he,was,afraid,to,look,at,it,[END]
besides,it,was,so,cold,that,he,hated,taking,off,his,gloves,[END]
sam,did,not,know,what,he,hoped,to,find,in,the,empty,houses,[END]
maybe,the,wildlings,had,left,some,food,behind,[END]
he,had,to,take,a,look,[END]
jon,had,searched,the,huts,at,whitetree,on,their,way,north,[END]
inside,one,hovel,sam,heard,a,rustling,of,rats,from,a,dark,corner,but,otherwise,there,was,nothing,in,any,of,them,but,old,straw,old,smells,and,some,ashes,beneath,the,smoke,hole,[END]
he,turned,back,to,the,weirwood,and,studied,the,carved,face,a,moment,[END]
it,is,not,the,face,we,saw,he,admitted,to,himself,[END]
the,tree's,not,half,as,big,as,the,one,at,whitetree,[END]
the,red,eyes,wept,blood,and,he,didn't,remember,that,either,[END]
clumsily,sam,sank,to,his,knees,[END]
old,gods,hear,my,prayer,[END]
the,seven,were,my,father's,gods,but,i,said,my,words,to,you,when,i,joined,the,watch,[END]
help,us,now,[END]
i,fear,we,might,be,lost,[END]
we're,hungry,too,and,so,cold,[END]
i,don't,know,what,gods,i,believe,in,now,but,[END]
please,if,you're,there,help,us,[END]
gilly,has,a,little,son,[END]
that,was,all,that,he,could,think,to,say,[END]
the,dusk,was,deepening,the,leaves,of,the,weirwood,rustling,softly,waving,like,a,thousand,blood-red,hands,[END]
whether,jon's,gods,had,heard,him,or,not,he,could,not,say,[END]
by,the,time,he,returned,to,the,longhall,gilly,had,the,fire,going,[END]
she,sat,close,to,it,with,her,furs,opened,the,babe,at,her,breast,[END]
he's,as,hungry,as,we,are,sam,thought,[END]
the,old,women,had,smuggled,out,food,for,them,from,craster's,but,they,had,eaten,most,of,it,by,now,[END]
sam,had,been,a,hopeless,hunter,even,at,horn,hill,where,game,was,plentiful,and,he,had,hounds,and,huntsmen,to,help,him,here,in,this,endless,empty,forest,the,chances,of,him,catching,anything,were,remote,[END]
his,efforts,at,fishing,the,lakes,and,half-frozen,streams,had,been,dismal,failures,as,well,[END]
how,much,longer,sam,[END]
gilly,asked,[END]
is,it,far,still,[END]
not,so,far,[END]
not,so,far,as,it,was,[END]
sam,shrugged,out,of,his,pack,eased,himself,awkwardly,to,the,floor,and,tried,to,cross,his,legs,[END]
his,back,ached,so,abominably,from,the,walking,that,he,would,have,liked,to,lean,up,against,one,of,the,carved,wooden,pillars,that,supported,the,roof,but,the,fire,was,in,the,center,of,the,hall,beneath,the,smoke,hole,and,he,craved,warmth,even,more,than,comfort,[END]
another,few,days,should,see,us,there,[END]
sam,had,his,maps,but,if,this,wasn't,whitetree,then,they,weren't,going,to,be,much,use,[END]
we,went,too,far,east,to,get,around,that,lake,he,fretted,or,maybe,too,far,west,when,i,tried,to,double,back,[END]
he,was,coming,to,hate,lakes,and,rivers,[END]
up,here,there,was,never,a,ferry,or,bridge,which,meant,walking,all,the,way,around,the,lakes,and,searching,for,places,to,ford,the,rivers,[END]
it,was,easier,to,follow,a,game,trail,than,to,struggle,through,the,brush,easier,to,circle,a,ridge,instead,of,climbing,it,[END]
if,bannen,or,dywen,were,with,us,we'd,be,at,castle,black,by,now,warming,our,feet,in,the,common,room,[END]
bannen,was,dead,though,and,dywen,gone,with,grenn,and,dolorous,edd,and,the,others,[END]
the,wall,is,three,hundred,miles,long,and,seven,hundred,feet,high,sam,reminded,himself,[END]
if,they,kept,going,south,they,had,to,find,it,sooner,or,later,[END]
and,he,was,certain,that,they,had,been,going,south,[END]
by,day,he,took,directions,from,the,sun,and,on,clear,nights,they,could,follow,the,ice,dragon's,tail,though,they,hadn't,traveled,much,by,night,since,the,second,horse,had,died,[END]
even,when,the,moon,was,full,it,was,too,dark,beneath,the,trees,and,it,would,have,been,so,easy,for,sam,or,the,last,garron,to,break,a,leg,[END]
we,have,to,be,well,south,by,now,we,have,to,be,[END]
what,he,wasn't,so,certain,of,was,how,far,east,or,west,they,might,have,strayed,[END]

it,flapped,its,wings,and,screamed,along,with,gilly,[END]
the,wights,were,almost,on,her,[END]
he,heard,the,dark,red,leaves,of,the,weirwood,rustling,whispering,to,one,another,in,a,tongue,he,did,not,know,[END]
the,starlight,itself,seemed,to,stir,and,all,around,them,the,trees,groaned,and,creaked,[END]
sam,tarly,turned,the,color,of,curdled,milk,and,his,eyes,went,wide,as,plates,[END]
ravens,[END]
they,were,in,the,weirwood,hundreds,of,them,thousands,perched,on,the,bone-white,branches,peering,between,the,leaves,[END]
he,saw,their,beaks,open,as,they,screamed,saw,them,spread,their,black,wings,[END]
shrieking,flapping,they,descended,on,the,wights,in,angry,clouds,[END]
they,swarmed,round,chett's,face,and,pecked,at,his,blue,eyes,they,covered,the,sisterman,like,flies,they,plucked,gobbets,from,inside,hake's,shattered,head,[END]
there,were,so,many,that,when,sam,looked,up,he,could,not,see,the,moon,[END]
go,said,the,bird,on,his,shoulder,[END]
go,go,go,[END]
sam,ran,puffs,of,frost,exploding,from,his,mouth,[END]
all,around,him,the,wights,flailed,at,the,black,wings,and,sharp,beaks,that,assailed,them,falling,in,an,eerie,silence,with,never,a,grunt,nor,cry,[END]
but,the,ravens,ignored,sam,[END]
he,took,gilly,by,the,hand,and,pulled,her,away,from,the,weirwood,[END]
we,have,to,go,[END]
but,where,[END]
gilly,hurried,after,him,holding,her,baby,[END]
they,killed,our,horse,how,will,we,[END]
brother,[END]
the,shout,cut,through,the,night,through,the,shrieks,of,a,thousand,ravens,[END]
beneath,the,trees,a,man,muffled,head,to,heels,in,mottled,blacks,and,greys,sat,astride,an,elk,[END]
here,the,rider,called,[END]
a,hood,shadowed,his,face,[END]
he's,wearing,blacks,[END]
sam,urged,gilly,toward,him,[END]
the,elk,was,huge,a,great,elk,ten,feet,tall,at,the,shoulder,with,a,rack,of,antlers,near,as,wide,[END]
the,creature,sank,to,his,knees,to,let,them,mount,[END]
here,the,rider,said,reaching,down,with,a,gloved,hand,to,pull,gilly,up,behind,him,[END]
then,it,was,sam's,turn,[END]
my,thanks,he,puffed,[END]
only,when,he,grasped,the,offered,hand,did,he,realize,that,the,rider,wore,no,glove,[END]
his,hand,was,black,and,cold,with,fingers,hard,as,stone,[END]
arya,[END]
when,they,reached,the,top,of,the,ridge,and,saw,the,river,sandor,clegane,reined,up,hard,and,cursed,[END]
the,rain,was,falling,from,a,black,iron,sky,pricking,the,green,and,brown,torrent,with,ten,thousand,swords,[END]
it,must,be,a,mile,across,arya,thought,[END]
the,tops,of,half,a,hundred,trees,poked,up,out,the,swirling,waters,their,limbs,clutching,for,the,sky,like,the,arms,of,drowning,men,[END]
thick,mats,of,sodden,leaves,choked,the,shoreline,and,farther,out,in,the,channel,she,glimpsed,something,pale,and,swollen,a,deer,or,perhaps,a,dead,horse,moving,swiftly,downstream,[END]
there,was,a,sound,too,a,low,rumble,at,the,edge,of,hearing,like,the,sound,a,dog,makes,just,before,he,growls,[END]
arya,squirmed,in,the,saddle,and,felt,the,links,of,the,hound's,mail,digging,into,her,back,[END]
his,arms,encircled,her,on,the,left,the,burned,arm,he'd,donned,a,steel,vambrace,for,protection,but,she'd,seen,him,change,the,dressings,and,the,flesh,beneath,was,still,raw,and,seeping,[END]
if,the,burns,pained,him,though,sandor,clegane,gave,no,hint,of,it,[END]
is,this,the,blackwater,rush,[END]
they,had,ridden,so,far,in,rain,and,darkness,through,trackless,woods,and,nameless,villages,that,arya,had,lost,all,sense,of,where,they,were,[END]
it's,a,river,we,need,to,cross,that's,all,you,need,to,know,[END]
clegane,would,answer,her,from,time,to,time,but,he,had,warned,her,not,to,talk,back,[END]
he,had,given,her,a,lot,of,warnings,that,first,day,[END]
the,next,time,you,hit,me,i'll,tie,your,hands,behind,your,back,he'd,said,[END]
the,next,time,you,try,and,run,off,i'll,bind,your,feet,together,[END]
scream,or,shout,or,bite,me,again,and,i'll,gag,you,[END]
we,can,ride,double,or,i,can,throw,you,across,the,back,of,the,horse,trussed,up,like,a,sow,for,slaughter,[END]
your,choice,[END]
she,had,chosen,to,ride,but,the,first,time,they,made,camp,she'd,waited,until,she,thought,he,was,asleep,and,found,a,big,jagged,rock,to,smash,his,ugly,head,in,[END]
quiet,as,a,shadow,she,told,herself,as,she,crept,toward,him,but,that,wasn't,quiet,enough,[END]
the,hound,hadn't,been,asleep,after,all,[END]
or,maybe,he'd,woken,[END]
whichever,it,was,his,eyes,opened,his,mouth,twitched,and,he,took,the,rock,away,from,her,as,if,she,were,a,baby,[END]
the,best,she,could,do,was,kick,him,[END]
i'll,give,you,that,one,he,said,when,he,flung,the,rock,into,the,bushes,[END]
but,if,you're,stupid,enough,to,try,again,i'll,hurt,you,[END]
why,don't,you,just,kill,me,like,you,did,mycah,[END]
arya,had,screamed,at,him,[END]
she,was,still,defiant,then,more,angry,than,scared,[END]
he,answered,by,grabbing,the,front,of,her,tunic,and,yanking,her,within,an,inch,of,his,burned,face,[END]
the,next,time,you,say,that,name,i'll,beat,you,so,bad,you'll,wish,i,killed,you,[END]
after,that,he,rolled,her,in,his,horse,blanket,every,night,when,he,went,to,sleep,and,tied,ropes,around,her,top,and,bottom,so,she,was,bound,up,as,tight,as,a,babe,in,swaddling,clothes,[END]
it,has,to,be,the,blackwater,arya,decided,as,she,watched,the,rain,lash,the,river,[END]
the,hound,was,joffrey's,dog,he,was,taking,her,back,to,the,red,keep,to,hand,to,joffrey,and,the,queen,[END]
she,wished,that,the,sun,would,come,out,so,she,could,tell,which,way,they,were,going,[END]
the,more,she,looked,at,the,moss,on,the,trees,the,more,confused,she,got,[END]
the,blackwater,wasn't,so,wide,at,king's,landing,but,that,was,before,the,rains,[END]
the,fords,will,all,be,gone,sandor,clegane,said,and,i,wouldn't,care,to,try,and,swim,over,neither,[END]
there's,no,way,across,she,thought,[END]
lord,beric,will,catch,us,for,sure,[END]
clegane,had,pushed,his,big,black,stallion,hard,doubling,back,thrice,to,throw,off,pursuit,once,even,riding,half,a,mile,up,the,center,of,a,swollen,stream,[END]
but,arya,still,expected,to,see,the,outlaws,every,time,she,looked,back,[END]
she,had,tried,to,help,them,by,scratching,her,name,on,the,trunks,of,trees,when,she,went,in,the,bushes,to,make,water,but,the,fourth,time,she,did,it,he,caught,her,and,that,was,the,end,of,that,[END]
it,doesn't,matter,arya,told,herself,thoros,will,find,me,in,his,flames,[END]
only,he,hadn't,[END]
not,yet,anyway,and,once,they,crossed,the,river,[END]
harroway,town,shouldn't,be,far,the,hound,said,[END]
where,lord,roote,stables,old,king,andahar's,two-headed,water,horse,[END]
maybe,we'll,ride,across,[END]
arya,had,never,heard,of,old,king,andahar,[END]
she'd,never,seen,a,horse,with,two,heads,either,especially,not,one,who,could,run,on,water,but,she,knew,better,than,to,ask,[END]
she,held,her,tongue,and,sat,stiff,as,the,hound,turned,the,stallion's,head,and,trotted,along,the,ridgeline,following,the,river,downstream,[END]
at,least,the,rain,was,at,their,backs,this,way,[END]
she'd,had,enough,of,it,stinging,her,eyes,half-blind,and,washing,down,her,cheeks,like,she,was,crying,[END]
wolves,never,cry,she,reminded,herself,again,[END]
it,could,not,have,been,much,past,noon,but,the,sky,was,dark,as,dusk,[END]
they,had,not,seen,the,sun,in,more,days,than,she,could,count,[END]
arya,was,soaked,to,the,bone,saddle-sore,sniffling,and,achy,[END]
she,had,a,fever,too,and,sometimes,shivered,uncontrollably,but,when,she'd,told,the,hound,that,she,was,sick,he'd,only,snarled,at,her,[END]
wipe,your,nose,and,shut,your,mouth,he,told,her,[END]
half,the,time,he,slept,in,the,saddle,now,trusting,his,stallion,to,follow,whatever,rutted,farm,track,or,game,trail,they,were,on,[END]
the,horse,was,a,heavy,courser,almost,as,big,as,a,destrier,but,much,faster,[END]
stranger,the,hound,called,him,[END]
arya,had,tried,to,steal,him,once,when,clegane,was,taking,a,piss,against,a,tree,thinking,she,could,ride,off,before,he,could,catch,her,[END]
stranger,had,almost,bitten,her,face,off,[END]
he,was,gentle,as,an,old,gelding,with,his,master,but,otherwise,he,had,a,temper,as,black,as,he,was,[END]
she,had,never,known,a,horse,so,quick,to,bite,or,kick,[END]
they,rode,beside,the,river,for,hours,splashing,across,two,muddy,vassal,streams,before,they,reached,the,place,that,sandor,clegane,had,spoken,of,[END]
lord,harroway's,town,he,said,and,then,when,he,saw,it,seven,hells,[END]
the,town,was,drowned,and,desolate,[END]
the,rising,waters,had,overflowed,the,riverbanks,[END]
all,that,remained,of,harroway,town,was,the,upper,story,of,a,daub-and-wattle,inn,the,seven-sided,dome,of,a,sunken,sept,two-thirds,of,a,stone,roundtower,some,moldy,thatch,roofs,and,a,forest,of,chimneys,[END]
but,there,was,smoke,coming,from,the,tower,arya,saw,and,below,one,arched,window,a,wide,flat-bottomed,boat,was,chained,up,tight,[END]
the,boat,had,a,dozen,oarlocks,and,a,pair,of,great,carved,wooden,horse,heads,mounted,fore,and,aft,[END]
the,two-headed,horse,she,realized,[END]
there,was,a,wooden,house,with,a,sod,roof,right,in,the,middle,of,the,deck,and,when,the,hound,cupped,his,hands,around,his,mouth,and,shouted,two,men,came,spilling,out,[END]
a,third,appeared,in,the,window,of,the,roundtower,clutching,a,loaded,crossbow,[END]
what,do,you,want,[END]
he,shouted,across,the,swirling,brown,waters,[END]
take,us,over,the,hound,shouted,back,[END]
the,men,in,the,boat,conferred,with,one,another,[END]
one,of,them,a,grizzled,grey-haired,man,with,thick,arms,and,a,bent,back,stepped,to,the,rail,[END]
it,will,cost,you,[END]
then,i'll,pay,[END]
with,what,[END]
arya,wondered,[END]
the,outlaws,had,taken,clegane's,gold,but,maybe,lord,beric,had,left,him,some,silver,and,copper,[END]
a,ferry,ride,shouldn't,cost,more,than,a,few,coppers,[END]
the,ferrymen,were,talking,again,[END]
finally,the,bent-backed,one,turned,away,and,gave,a,shout,[END]
six,more,men,appeared,pulling,up,hoods,to,keep,the,rain,off,their,heads,[END]
still,more,squirmed,out,the,holdfast,window,and,leapt,down,onto,the,deck,[END]
half,of,them,looked,enough,like,the,bent-backed,man,to,be,his,kin,[END]
some,of,them,undid,the,chains,and,took,up,long,poles,while,the,others,slid,heavy,wide-bladed,oars,through,the,locks,[END]
the,ferry,swung,about,and,began,to,creep,slowly,toward,the,shallows,oars,stroking,smoothly,on,either,side,[END]
sandor,clegane,rode,down,the,hill,to,meet,it,[END]
when,the,aft,end,of,the,boat,slammed,into,the,hillside,the,ferrymen,opened,a,wide,door,beneath,the,carved,horse's,head,and,extended,a,heavy,oaken,plank,[END]
stranger,balked,at,the,water's,edge,but,the,hound,put,his,heels,into,the,courser's,flank,and,urged,him,up,the,gangway,[END]
the,bent-backed,man,was,waiting,for,them,on,deck,[END]
wet,enough,for,you,ser,[END]
he,asked,smiling,[END]
the,hound's,mouth,gave,a,twitch,[END]
i,need,your,boat,not,your,bloody,wit,[END]
he,dismounted,and,pulled,arya,down,beside,him,[END]
one,of,the,boatmen,reached,for,stranger's,bridle,[END]
i,wouldn't,clegane,said,as,the,horse,kicked,[END]
the,man,leapt,back,slipped,on,the,rain-slick,deck,and,crashed,onto,his,arse,cursing,[END]
the,ferryman,with,the,bent,back,wasn't,smiling,any,longer,[END]
we,can,get,you,across,he,said,sourly,[END]
it,will,cost,you,a,gold,piece,[END]
another,for,the,horse,[END]
a,third,for,the,boy,[END]
three,dragons,[END]
clegane,gave,a,bark,of,laughter,[END]
for,three,dragons,i,should,own,the,bloody,ferry,[END]
last,year,might,be,you,could,[END]
but,with,this,river,i'll,need,extra,hands,on,the,poles,and,oars,just,to,see,we,don't,get,swept,a,hundred,miles,out,to,sea,[END]
here's,your,choice,[END]
three,dragons,or,you,teach,that,hellhorse,how,to,walk,on,water,[END]
i,like,an,honest,brigand,[END]
have,it,your,way,[END]
three,dragons,[END]
when,you,put,us,ashore,safe,on,the,north,bank,[END]
i'll,have,them,now,or,we,don't,go,[END]
the,man,thrust,out,a,thick,callused,hand,palm,up,[END]
clegane,rattled,his,longsword,to,loosen,the,blade,in,the,scabbard,[END]
here's,your,choice,[END]
gold,on,the,north,bank,or,steel,on,the,south,[END]
the,ferryman,looked,up,at,the,hound's,face,[END]
arya,could,tell,that,he,didn't,like,what,he,saw,there,[END]
he,had,a,dozen,men,behind,him,strong,men,with,oars,and,hardwood,poles,in,their,hands,but,none,of,them,were,rushing,forward,to,help,him,[END]
together,they,could,overwhelm,sandor,clegane,though,he'd,likely,kill,three,or,four,of,them,before,they,took,him,down,[END]
how,do,i,know,you're,good,for,it,[END]
the,bent-backed,man,asked,after,a,moment,[END]
he's,not,she,wanted,to,shout,[END]
instead,she,bit,her,lip,[END]
knight's,honor,the,hound,said,unsmiling,[END]
he's,not,even,a,knight,[END]
she,did,not,say,that,either,[END]
that,will,do,[END]
the,ferryman,spat,[END]
come,on,then,we,can,have,you,across,before,dark,[END]
tie,the,horse,up,i,don't,want,him,spooking,when,we're,under,way,[END]
there's,a,brazier,in,the,cabin,if,you,and,your,son,want,to,get,warm,[END]
i'm,not,his,stupid,son,[END]
said,arya,furiously,[END]
that,was,even,worse,than,being,taken,for,a,boy,[END]
she,was,so,angry,that,she,might,have,told,them,who,she,really,was,only,sandor,clegane,grabbed,her,by,the,back,of,the,collar,and,hoisted,her,one-handed,off,the,deck,[END]
how,many,times,do,i,need,to,tell,you,to,shut,your,bloody,mouth,[END]
he,shook,her,so,hard,her,teeth,rattled,then,let,her,fall,[END]
get,in,there,and,get,dry,like,the,man,said,[END]
arya,did,as,she,was,told,[END]
the,big,iron,brazier,was,glowing,red,filling,the,room,with,a,sullen,suffocating,heat,[END]
it,felt,pleasant,to,stand,beside,it,to,warm,her,hands,and,dry,off,a,little,bit,but,as,soon,as,she,felt,the,deck,move,under,her,feet,she,slipped,back,out,through,the,forward,door,[END]
the,two-headed,horse,eased,slowly,through,the,shallows,picking,its,way,between,the,chimneys,and,rooftops,of,drowned,harroway,[END]
a,dozen,men,labored,at,the,oars,while,four,more,used,the,long,poles,to,push,off,whenever,they,came,too,close,to,a,rock,a,tree,or,a,sunken,house,[END]
the,bent-backed,man,had,the,rudder,[END]
rain,pattered,against,the,smooth,planks,of,the,deck,and,splashed,off,the,tall,carved,horseheads,fore,and,aft,[END]
arya,was,getting,soaked,again,but,she,didn't,care,[END]
she,wanted,to,see,[END]
the,man,with,the,crossbow,still,stood,in,the,window,of,the,roundtower,she,saw,[END]
his,eyes,followed,her,as,the,ferry,slid,by,underneath,[END]
she,wondered,if,he,was,this,lord,roote,that,the,hound,had,mentioned,[END]
he,doesn't,look,much,like,a,lord,[END]
but,then,she,didn't,look,much,like,a,lady,either,[END]
once,they,were,beyond,the,town,and,out,in,the,river,proper,the,current,grew,much,stronger,[END]
through,the,grey,haze,of,rain,arya,could,make,out,a,tall,stone,pillar,on,the,far,shore,that,surely,marked,the,ferry,landing,but,no,sooner,had,she,seen,it,than,she,realized,that,they,were,being,pushed,away,from,it,downstream,[END]
the,oarsmen,were,rowing,more,vigorously,now,fighting,the,rage,of,the,river,[END]
leaves,and,broken,branches,swirled,past,as,fast,as,if,they'd,been,fired,from,a,scorpion,[END]
the,men,with,the,poles,leaned,out,and,shoved,away,anything,that,came,too,close,[END]
it,was,windier,out,here,too,[END]
whenever,she,turned,to,look,upstream,arya,got,a,face,full,of,blowing,rain,[END]
stranger,was,screaming,and,kicking,as,the,deck,moved,underfoot,[END]
if,i,jumped,over,the,side,the,river,would,wash,me,away,before,the,hound,even,knew,that,i,was,gone,[END]
she,looked,back,over,a,shoulder,and,saw,sandor,clegane,struggling,with,his,frightened,horse,trying,to,calm,him,[END]
she,would,never,have,a,better,chance,to,get,away,from,him,[END]
i,might,drown,though,[END]
jon,used,to,say,that,she,swam,like,a,fish,but,even,a,fish,might,have,trouble,in,this,river,[END]
still,drowning,might,be,better,than,king's,landing,[END]
she,thought,about,joffrey,and,crept,up,to,the,prow,[END]
the,river,was,murky,brown,with,mud,and,lashed,by,rain,looking,more,like,soup,than,water,[END]
arya,wondered,how,cold,it,would,be,[END]
i,couldn't,get,much,wetter,than,i,am,now,[END]
she,put,a,hand,on,the,rail,[END]
but,a,sudden,shout,snapped,her,head,about,before,she,could,leap,[END]
the,ferrymen,were,rushing,forward,poles,in,hand,[END]
for,a,moment,she,did,not,understand,what,was,happening,[END]
then,she,saw,it,an,uprooted,tree,huge,and,dark,coming,straight,at,them,[END]
a,tangle,of,roots,and,limbs,poked,up,out,of,the,water,as,it,came,like,the,reaching,arms,of,a,great,kraken,[END]
the,oarsmen,were,backing,water,frantically,trying,to,avoid,a,collision,that,could,capsize,them,or,stove,their,hull,in,[END]
the,old,man,had,wrenched,the,rudder,about,and,the,horse,at,the,prow,was,swinging,downstream,but,too,slowly,[END]
glistening,brown,and,black,the,tree,rushed,toward,them,like,a,battering,ram,[END]
it,could,not,have,been,more,than,ten,feet,from,their,prow,when,two,of,the,boatmen,somehow,caught,it,with,their,long,poles,[END]
one,snapped,and,the,long,splintering,craaaack,made,it,sound,as,if,the,ferry,were,breaking,up,beneath,them,[END]
but,the,second,man,managed,to,give,the,trunk,a,hard,shove,just,enough,to,deflect,it,away,from,them,[END]
the,tree,swept,past,the,ferry,with,inches,to,spare,its,branches,scrabbling,like,claws,against,the,horsehead,[END]
only,just,when,it,seemed,as,if,they,were,clear,one,of,the,monster's,upper,limbs,dealt,them,a,glancing,thump,[END]
the,ferry,seemed,to,shudder,and,arya,slipped,landing,painfully,on,one,knee,[END]
the,man,with,the,broken,pole,was,not,so,lucky,[END]
she,heard,him,shout,as,he,stumbled,over,the,side,[END]
then,the,raging,brown,water,closed,over,him,and,he,was,gone,in,the,time,it,took,arya,to,climb,back,to,her,feet,[END]
one,of,the,other,boatmen,snatched,up,a,coil,of,rope,but,there,was,no,one,to,throw,it,to,[END]
maybe,he'll,wash,up,someplace,downstream,arya,tried,to,tell,herself,but,the,thought,had,a,hollow,ring,[END]
she,had,lost,all,desire,to,go,swimming,[END]
when,sandor,clegane,shouted,at,her,to,get,back,inside,before,he,beat,her,bloody,she,went,meekly,[END]

satin's,face,was,a,ghastly,white,[END]
so,are,they,[END]
jon,leaned,his,crutch,up,against,a,merlon,and,took,up,his,longbow,bending,the,smooth,thick,dornish,yew,to,slip,a,bowstring,through,the,notches,[END]
don't,waste,a,quarrel,unless,you,know,you,have,a,good,clean,shot,he,said,when,satin,returned,from,waking,dick,[END]
we,have,an,ample,supply,up,here,but,ample,doesn't,mean,inexhaustible,[END]
and,step,behind,a,merlon,to,reload,don't,try,and,hide,in,back,of,a,scarecrow,[END]
they're,made,of,straw,an,arrow,will,punch,through,them,[END]
he,did,not,bother,telling,dick,follard,anything,[END]
dick,could,read,your,lips,if,there,was,enough,light,and,he,gave,a,damn,what,you,were,saying,but,he,knew,it,all,already,[END]
the,three,of,them,took,up,positions,on,three,sides,of,the,round,tower,[END]
jon,hung,a,quiver,from,his,belt,and,pulled,an,arrow,[END]
the,shaft,was,black,the,fletching,grey,[END]
as,he,notched,it,to,his,string,he,remembered,something,that,theon,greyjoy,had,once,said,after,a,hunt,[END]
the,boar,can,keep,his,tusks,and,the,bear,his,claws,he,had,declared,smiling,that,way,he,did,[END]
there's,nothing,half,so,mortal,as,a,grey,goose,feather,[END]
jon,had,never,been,half,the,hunter,that,theon,was,but,he,was,no,stranger,to,the,longbow,either,[END]
there,were,dark,shapes,slipping,around,the,armory,backs,against,the,stone,but,he,could,not,see,them,well,enough,to,waste,an,arrow,[END]
he,heard,distant,shouts,and,saw,the,archers,on,the,tower,of,guards,loosing,shafts,at,the,ground,[END]
that,was,too,far,off,to,concern,jon,[END]
but,when,he,glimpsed,three,shadows,detach,themselves,from,the,old,stables,fifty,yards,away,he,stepped,up,to,the,crenel,raised,his,bow,and,drew,[END]
they,were,running,so,he,led,them,waiting,waiting,[END]
the,arrow,made,a,soft,hiss,as,it,left,his,string,[END]
a,moment,later,there,was,a,grunt,and,suddenly,only,two,shadows,were,loping,across,the,yard,[END]
they,ran,all,the,faster,but,jon,had,already,pulled,a,second,arrow,from,his,quiver,[END]
this,time,he,hurried,the,shot,too,much,and,missed,[END]
the,wildlings,were,gone,by,the,time,he,nocked,again,[END]
he,searched,for,another,target,and,found,four,rushing,around,the,empty,shell,of,the,lord,commander's,keep,[END]
the,moonlight,glimmered,off,their,spears,and,axes,and,the,gruesome,devices,on,their,round,leathern,shields,skulls,and,bones,serpents,bear,claws,twisted,demonic,faces,[END]
free,folk,he,knew,[END]
the,thenns,carried,shields,of,black,boiled,leather,with,bronze,rims,and,bosses,but,theirs,were,plain,and,unadorned,[END]
these,were,the,lighter,wicker,shields,of,raiders,[END]
jon,pulled,the,goose,feather,back,to,his,ear,aimed,and,loosed,the,arrow,then,nocked,and,drew,and,loosed,again,[END]
the,first,shaft,pierced,the,bearclaw,shield,the,second,one,a,throat,[END]
the,wildling,screamed,as,he,went,down,[END]
he,heard,the,deep,thrum,of,deaf,dick's,crossbow,to,his,left,and,satin's,a,moment,later,[END]
i,got,one,[END]
the,boy,cried,hoarsely,[END]
i,got,one,in,the,chest,[END]
get,another,jon,called,[END]
he,did,not,have,to,search,for,targets,now,only,choose,them,[END]
he,dropped,a,wildling,archer,as,he,was,fitting,an,arrow,to,his,string,then,sent,a,shaft,toward,the,axeman,hacking,at,the,door,of,hardin's,tower,[END]
that,time,he,missed,but,the,arrow,quivering,in,the,oak,made,the,wildling,reconsider,[END]
it,was,only,as,he,was,running,off,that,jon,recognized,big,boil,[END]
half,a,heartbeat,later,old,mully,put,an,arrow,through,his,leg,from,the,roof,of,the,flint,barracks,and,he,crawled,off,bleeding,[END]
that,will,stop,him,bitching,about,his,boil,jon,thought,[END]
when,his,quiver,was,empty,he,went,to,get,another,and,moved,to,a,different,crenel,side,by,side,with,deaf,dick,follard,[END]
jon,got,off,three,arrows,for,every,bolt,deaf,dick,discharged,but,that,was,the,advantage,of,the,longbow,[END]
the,crossbow,penetrated,better,some,insisted,but,it,was,slow,and,cumbersome,to,reload,[END]
he,could,hear,the,wildlings,shouting,to,each,other,and,somewhere,to,the,west,a,warhorn,blew,[END]
the,world,was,moonlight,and,shadow,and,time,became,an,endless,round,of,notch,and,draw,and,loose,[END]
a,wildling,arrow,ripped,through,the,throat,of,the,straw,sentinel,beside,him,but,jon,snow,scarcely,noticed,[END]

the,magnar,at,least,was,a,foe,that,he,could,hate,[END]
give,me,styr,[END]
his,fingers,were,growing,stiff,and,his,thumb,was,bleeding,but,still,jon,notched,and,drew,and,loosed,[END]

again,jon,notched,and,drew,and,loosed,but,there,was,only,one,of,him,and,one,of,satin,and,a,good,sixty,or,seventy,thenns,pounding,up,the,stairs,killing,as,they,went,drunk,on,victory,[END]

it,gets,his,bloodlust,up,[END]

fetch,the,torches,jon,told,satin,[END]

again,said,jon,and,again,and,again,[END]

with,flames,below,and,flames,above,the,wildlings,had,nowhere,to,go,[END]
some,continued,upward,and,died,[END]

some,stayed,where,they,were,[END]
they,died,as,well,[END]
many,leapt,from,the,steps,before,they,burned,and,died,from,the,fall,[END]
twenty-odd,thenns,were,still,huddled,together,between,the,fires,when,the,ice,cracked,from,the,heat,and,the,whole,lower,third,of,the,stair,broke,off,along,with,several,tons,of,ice,[END]
that,was,the,last,that,jon,snow,saw,of,styr,the,magnar,of,thenn,[END]

his,wounded,leg,hurt,so,badly,that,he,could,hardly,walk,even,with,the,crutch,[END]

the,stables,and,the,common,hall,had,burned,down,to,smoking,cinders,by,then,but,the,fire,still,raged,along,the,wall,climbing,step,by,step,and,landing,by,landing,[END]
from,time,to,time,they'd,hear,a,groan,and,then,a,craaaack,and,another,chunk,would,come,crashing,off,the,wall,[END]
the,air,was,full,of,ash,and,ice,crystals,[END]
he,found,quort,dead,and,stone,thumbs,dying,[END]
he,found,some,dead,and,dying,thenns,he,had,never,truly,known,[END]
he,found,big,boil,weak,from,all,the,blood,he'd,lost,but,still,alive,[END]
he,found,ygritte,sprawled,across,a,patch,of,old,snow,beneath,the,lord,commander's,tower,with,an,arrow,between,her,breasts,[END]
the,ice,crystals,had,settled,over,her,face,and,in,the,moonlight,it,looked,as,though,she,wore,a,glittering,silver,mask,[END]
the,arrow,was,black,jon,saw,but,it,was,fletched,with,white,duck,feathers,[END]
not,mine,he,told,himself,not,one,of,mine,[END]
but,he,felt,as,if,it,were,[END]

daenerys,[END]
meereen,was,as,large,as,astapor,and,yunkai,combined,[END]

behind,them,huge,against,the,sky,could,be,seen,the,top,of,the,great,pyramid,a,monstrous,thing,eight,hundred,feet,tall,with,a,towering,bronze,harpy,at,its,top,[END]

she,has,a,woman's,heart,and,a,chicken's,legs,[END]

the,lance,he,bore,was,fourteen,feet,long,swirled,in,pink,and,white,and,his,hair,was,shaped,and,teased,and,lacquered,into,two,great,curling,ram's,horns,[END]
back,and,forth,he,rode,beneath,the,walls,of,multicolored,bricks,challenging,the,besiegers,to,send,a,champion,forth,to,meet,him,in,single,combat,[END]

this,man,is,a,buzzing,fly,no,more,[END]

he,does,arstan,whitebeard,insisted,[END]

the,whole,city,of,meereen,seemed,to,be,screaming,him,on,[END]
the,besiegers',cheers,seemed,few,and,thin,by,comparison,her,unsullied,stood,in,silent,ranks,watching,with,stone,faces,[END]
belwas,might,have,been,made,of,stone,as,well,[END]

he's,going,to,be,impaled,she,thought,[END]
as,the,eunuch,spun,sideways,[END]
and,quick,as,the,blink,of,an,eye,the,horseman,was,beyond,him,wheeling,raising,the,lance,[END]
belwas,made,no,move,to,strike,at,him,[END]
the,meereenese,on,the,walls,screamed,even,louder,[END]

dany,demanded,[END]

again,belwas,waited,then,spun,and,knocked,the,point,of,the,lance,aside,[END]
she,could,hear,the,eunuch's,booming,laughter,echoing,across,the,plain,as,the,hero,went,past,him,[END]
the,lance,is,too,long,ser,jorah,said,[END]
all,belwas,needs,do,is,avoid,the,point,[END]
instead,of,trying,to,spit,him,so,prettily,the,fool,should,ride,right,over,him,[END]
oznak,zo,pahl,charged,a,third,time,and,now,dany,could,see,plainly,that,he,was,riding,past,belwas,the,way,a,westerosi,knight,might,ride,at,an,opponent,in,a,tilt,rather,than,at,him,like,a,dothraki,riding,down,a,foe,[END]
the,flat,level,ground,allowed,the,charger,to,get,up,a,good,speed,but,it,also,made,it,easy,for,the,eunuch,to,dodge,the,cumbersome,fourteen-foot,lance,[END]
meereen's,pink-and-white,hero,tried,to,anticipate,this,time,and,swung,his,lance,sideways,at,the,last,second,to,catch,strong,belwas,when,he,dodged,[END]
but,the,eunuch,had,anticipated,too,and,this,time,he,dropped,down,instead,of,spinning,sideways,[END]
the,lance,passed,harmlessly,over,his,head,[END]
and,suddenly,belwas,was,rolling,and,bringing,the,razor-sharp,arakh,around,in,a,silver,arc,[END]
they,heard,the,charger,scream,as,the,blade,bit,into,his,legs,and,then,the,horse,was,falling,the,hero,tumbling,from,the,saddle,[END]
a,sudden,silence,swept,along,the,brick,parapets,of,meereen,[END]
now,it,was,dany's,people,who,were,screaming,and,cheering,[END]
oznak,leapt,clear,of,his,horse,and,managed,to,draw,his,sword,before,strong,belwas,was,on,him,[END]
steel,sang,against,steel,too,fast,and,furious,for,dany,to,follow,the,blows,[END]
it,could,not,have,been,a,dozen,heartbeats,before,belwas's,chest,was,awash,in,blood,from,a,slice,below,his,breasts,and,oznak,zo,pahl,had,an,arakh,planted,right,between,his,ram's,horns,[END]
the,eunuch,wrenched,the,blade,loose,and,parted,the,hero's,head,from,his,body,with,three,savage,blows,to,the,neck,[END]
he,held,it,up,high,for,the,meereenese,to,see,then,flung,it,toward,the,city,gates,and,let,it,bounce,and,roll,across,the,sand,[END]
so,much,for,the,hero,of,meereen,said,daario,laughing,[END]
a,victory,without,meaning,ser,jorah,cautioned,[END]
we,will,not,win,meereen,by,killing,its,defenders,one,at,a,time,[END]
no,dany,agreed,but,i'm,pleased,we,killed,this,one,[END]
the,defenders,on,the,walls,began,firing,their,crossbows,at,belwas,but,the,bolts,fell,short,or,skittered,harmlessly,along,the,ground,[END]
the,eunuch,turned,his,back,on,the,steel-tipped,rain,lowered,his,trousers,squatted,and,shat,in,the,direction,of,the,city,[END]
he,wiped,himself,with,oznak's,striped,cloak,and,paused,long,enough,to,loot,the,hero's,corpse,and,put,the,dying,horse,out,of,his,agony,before,trudging,back,to,the,olive,grove,[END]
the,besiegers,gave,him,a,raucous,welcome,as,soon,as,he,reached,the,camp,[END]
her,dothraki,hooted,and,screamed,and,the,unsullied,sent,up,a,great,clangor,by,banging,their,spears,against,their,shields,[END]
well,done,ser,jorah,told,him,and,brown,ben,tossed,the,eunuch,a,ripe,plum,and,said,a,sweet,fruit,for,a,sweet,fight,[END]
even,her,dothraki,handmaids,had,words,of,praise,[END]
we,would,braid,your,hair,and,hang,a,bell,in,it,strong,belwas,said,jhiqui,but,you,have,no,hair,to,braid,[END]
strong,belwas,needs,no,tinkly,bells,[END]
the,eunuch,ate,brown,ben's,plum,in,four,big,bites,and,tossed,aside,the,stone,[END]
strong,belwas,needs,liver,and,onions,[END]
you,shall,have,it,said,dany,[END]
strong,belwas,is,hurt,[END]
his,stomach,was,red,with,the,blood,sheeting,down,from,the,meaty,gash,beneath,his,breasts,[END]
it,is,nothing,[END]
i,let,each,man,cut,me,once,before,i,kill,him,[END]
he,slapped,his,bloody,belly,[END]

irri,and,jhiqui,poured,wine,[END]
her,granaries,are,full,to,bursting,[END]

waspwillow,dusky,roses,wild,mint,lady's,lace,daggerleaf,broom,prickly,ben,harpy's,gold,[END]

missandei,she,called,have,my,silver,saddled,[END]

when,the,horses,had,been,saddled,dany,and,her,companions,set,out,along,the,shoreline,away,from,the,city,[END]
even,so,she,could,feel,meereen,at,her,back,mocking,her,[END]
when,she,looked,over,one,shoulder,there,it,stood,the,afternoon,sun,blazing,off,the,bronze,harpy,atop,the,great,pyramid,[END]
inside,meereen,the,slavers,would,soon,be,reclining,in,their,fringed,tokars,to,feast,on,lamb,and,olives,unborn,puppies,honeyed,dormice,and,other,such,delicacies,whilst,outside,her,children,went,hungry,[END]
a,sudden,wild,anger,filled,her,[END]
i,will,bring,you,down,she,swore,[END]
as,they,rode,past,the,stakes,and,pits,that,surrounded,the,eunuch,encampment,dany,could,hear,grey,worm,and,his,sergeants,running,one,company,through,a,series,of,drills,with,shield,shortsword,and,heavy,spear,[END]
another,company,was,bathing,in,the,sea,clad,only,in,white,linen,breechclouts,[END]
the,eunuchs,were,very,clean,she,had,noticed,[END]
some,of,her,sellswords,smelled,as,if,they,had,not,washed,or,changed,their,clothes,since,her,father,lost,the,iron,throne,but,the,unsullied,bathed,each,evening,even,if,they'd,marched,all,day,[END]
when,no,water,was,available,they,cleansed,themselves,with,sand,the,dothraki,way,[END]
the,eunuchs,knelt,as,she,passed,raising,clenched,fists,to,their,breasts,[END]
dany,returned,the,salute,[END]
the,tide,was,coming,in,and,the,surf,foamed,about,the,feet,of,her,silver,[END]

south,of,the,ordered,realm,of,stakes,pits,drills,and,bathing,eunuchs,lay,the,encampments,of,her,freedmen,a,far,noisier,and,more,chaotic,place,[END]

they,passed,a,driftwood,fire,where,a,hundred,people,had,gathered,to,roast,the,carcass,of,a,horse,[END]
she,could,smell,the,meat,and,hear,the,fat,sizzling,as,the,spit,boys,turned,but,the,sight,only,made,her,frown,[END]
children,ran,behind,their,horses,skipping,and,laughing,[END]
instead,of,salutes,voices,called,to,her,on,every,side,in,a,babble,of,tongues,[END]

horse,wanted,to,take,the,black,though,the,great,buck-toothed,fool,[END]

i,need,to,speak,with,bronn,and,soon,[END]
he,didn't,want,to,think,about,what,this,was,like,to,cost,him,[END]

does,cersei,have,witnesses,against,me,[END]

even,so,it,made,a,welcome,sight,[END]
they,had,been,a,long,while,clawing,their,way,back,on,course,[END]

sick,with,terror,sick,with,fever,or,seasick,[END]
she,could,keep,nothing,down,and,even,sleep,came,hard,[END]
whenever,she,closed,her,eyes,she,saw,joffrey,tearing,at,his,collar,clawing,at,the,soft,skin,of,his,throat,dying,with,flakes,of,pie,crust,on,his,lips,and,wine,stains,on,his,doublet,[END]
and,the,wind,keening,in,the,lines,reminded,her,of,the,terrible,thin,sucking,sound,he'd,made,as,he,fought,to,draw,in,air,[END]
sometimes,she,dreamed,of,tyrion,as,well,[END]
he,did,nothing,she,told,littlefinger,once,when,he,paid,a,visit,to,her,cabin,to,see,if,she,were,feeling,any,better,[END]
he,did,not,kill,joffrey,true,but,the,dwarf's,hands,are,far,from,clean,[END]

jon,was,glad,of,that,[END]

it,was,likely,to,be,a,futile,gesture,jon,knew,but,it,had,to,be,better,than,standing,helpless,[END]

scorpions,he,commanded,[END]
catapults,[END]
the,scorpions,bolts,punched,deep,into,the,pelts,but,did,no,more,damage,than,the,fire,arrows,[END]
the,rocks,went,bouncing,off,the,turtle's,roof,leaving,dimples,in,the,thick,layers,of,hides,[END]
a,stone,from,one,of,the,trebuchets,might,have,crushed,it,but,the,one,machine,was,still,broken,and,the,wildlings,had,gone,wide,around,the,area,where,the,other,dropped,its,loads,[END]
jon,it's,still,coming,said,owen,the,oaf,[END]
he,could,see,that,for,himself,[END]
inch,by,inch,yard,by,yard,the,turtle,crept,closer,rolling,rumbling,and,rocking,as,it,crossed,the,killing,ground,[END]
once,the,wildlings,got,it,flush,against,the,wall,it,would,give,them,all,the,shelter,they,needed,while,their,axes,crashed,through,the,hastily-repaired,outer,gates,[END]
inside,under,the,ice,they,would,clear,the,loose,rubble,from,the,tunnel,in,a,matter,of,hours,and,then,there,would,be,nothing,to,stop,them,but,two,iron,gates,a,few,half-frozen,corpses,and,whatever,brothers,jon,cared,to,throw,in,their,path,to,fight,and,die,down,in,the,dark,[END]
to,his,left,the,catapult,made,a,thunk,and,filled,the,air,with,spinning,stones,[END]
they,plonked,down,on,the,turtle,like,hail,and,caromed,harmlessly,aside,[END]
the,wildling,archers,were,still,loosing,arrows,from,behind,their,mantlets,[END]
one,thudded,into,the,face,of,a,straw,man,and,pyp,said,four,for,watt,of,long,lake,[END]
we,have,a,tie,[END]
the,next,shaft,whistled,past,his,own,ear,however,[END]
fie,[END]
he,shouted,down,[END]
i'm,not,in,the,tourney,[END]
the,hides,won't,burn,jon,said,as,much,to,himself,as,to,the,others,[END]
their,only,hope,was,to,try,and,crush,the,turtle,when,it,reached,the,wall,[END]
for,that,they,needed,boulders,[END]
no,matter,how,stoutly,built,the,turtle,was,a,huge,chunk,of,rock,crashing,straight,down,on,top,of,it,from,seven,hundred,feet,was,bound,to,do,some,damage,[END]
grenn,owen,kegs,it's,time,[END]
alongside,the,warming,shed,a,dozen,stout,oaken,barrels,were,lined,up,in,a,row,[END]
they,were,full,of,crushed,rock,the,gravel,that,the,black,brothers,customarily,spread,on,the,footpaths,to,give,themselves,better,footing,atop,the,wall,[END]
yesterday,after,he'd,seen,the,free,folk,covering,the,turtle,with,sheepskins,jon,told,grenn,to,pour,water,into,the,barrels,as,much,as,they,would,take,[END]
the,water,would,seep,down,through,the,crushed,stone,and,overnight,the,whole,thing,would,freeze,solid,[END]
it,was,the,nearest,thing,to,a,boulder,they,were,going,to,get,[END]
why,do,we,need,to,freeze,it,[END]
grenn,had,asked,him,[END]
why,don't,we,just,roll,the,barrels,off,the,way,they,are,[END]
jon,answered,if,they,crash,against,the,wall,on,the,way,down,they'll,burst,and,loose,gravel,will,spray,everywhere,[END]
we,don't,want,to,rain,pebbles,on,the,whoresons,[END]
he,put,his,shoulder,to,the,one,barrel,with,grenn,while,kegs,and,owen,were,wrestling,with,another,[END]
together,they,rocked,it,back,and,forth,to,break,the,grip,of,the,ice,that,had,formed,around,its,bottom,[END]
the,bugger,weighs,a,ton,said,grenn,[END]
tip,it,over,and,roll,it,jon,said,[END]
careful,if,it,rolls,over,your,foot,you'll,end,up,like,spare,boot,[END]
once,the,barrel,was,on,its,side,jon,grabbed,a,torch,and,waved,it,above,the,surface,of,the,wall,back,and,forth,just,enough,to,melt,the,ice,a,little,[END]
the,thin,film,of,water,helped,the,barrel,roll,more,easily,[END]
too,easily,in,fact,they,almost,lost,it,[END]
but,finally,with,four,of,them,pooling,their,efforts,they,rolled,their,boulder,to,the,edge,and,stood,it,up,again,[END]

hoardings,marsh,should,have,built,hoardings,[END]
so,many,things,they,should,have,done,[END]

do,it,[END]

dawn,she,thought,[END]
another,day,[END]
another,new,day,[END]
it,was,the,old,days,she,hungered,for,[END]

a,godswood,without,gods,as,empty,as,me,[END]
she,scooped,up,a,handful,of,snow,and,squeezed,it,between,her,fingers,[END]
heavy,and,wet,the,snow,packed,easily,[END]
sansa,began,to,make,snowballs,shaping,and,smoothing,them,until,they,were,round,and,white,and,perfect,[END]
she,remembered,a,summer's,snow,in,winterfell,when,arya,and,bran,had,ambushed,her,as,she,emerged,from,the,keep,one,morning,[END]
they'd,each,had,a,dozen,snowballs,to,hand,and,she'd,had,none,[END]
bran,had,been,perched,on,the,roof,of,the,covered,bridge,out,of,reach,but,sansa,had,chased,arya,through,the,stables,and,around,the,kitchen,until,both,of,them,were,breathless,[END]

her,sister,came,back,to,see,if,she,was,hurt,[END]

what,do,i,want,with,snowballs,[END]
she,looked,at,her,sad,little,arsenal,[END]

two,walls,ankle-high,the,inner,taller,than,the,outer,[END]

this,singer's,killed,my,lady,wife,[END]
epilogue,[END]
the,road,up,to,oldstones,went,twice,around,the,hill,before,reaching,the,summit,[END]

merrett,glanced,about,and,saw,nothing,but,gorse,bracken,thistle,sedge,and,blackberry,bushes,between,the,pines,and,grey-green,sentinels,[END]

merrett,could,feel,the,headache,building,behind,his,eyes,and,he,knew,that,if,he,gave,it,half,a,chance,he,would,soon,feel,as,if,he,had,a,thunderstorm,raging,between,his,ears,[END]

lord,walder,would,soon,turn,two-and-ninety,[END]
his,ears,had,started,to,go,his,eyes,were,almost,gone,and,his,gout,was,so,bad,that,he,had,to,be,carried,everywhere,[END]

once,he,was,gone,though,[END]
when,ser,stevron,had,been,heir,that,was,one,thing,[END]

but,stevron,had,died,whilst,campaigning,with,the,young,wolf,in,the,west,of,waiting,no,doubt,lame,lothar,had,quipped,when,the,raven,brought,them,the,news,and,his,sons,and,grandsons,were,a,different,sort,of,frey,[END]

the,prospect,worried,merrett,more,than,words,could,say,[END]

i,have,never,had,any,bloody,luck,[END]

he'd,cozened,the,huge,northman,into,drinking,enough,wine,to,kill,any,three,normal,men,yet,after,roslin,had,been,bedded,the,greatjon,still,managed,to,snatch,the,sword,of,the,first,man,to,accost,him,and,break,his,arm,in,the,snatching,[END]

he,took,another,swallow,corked,the,skin,up,and,led,his,palfrey,through,broken,stones,gorse,and,thin,wind-whipped,trees,following,the,sounds,to,what,had,been,the,castle,ward,[END]
fallen,leaves,lay,thick,upon,the,ground,like,soldiers,after,some,great,slaughter,[END]
a,man,in,patched,faded,greens,was,sitting,crosslegged,atop,a,weathered,stone,sepulcher,fingering,the,strings,of,a,woodharp,[END]
the,music,was,soft,and,sad,[END]
merrett,knew,the,song,[END]
high,in,the,halls,of,the,kings,who,are,gone,jenny,would,dance,with,her,ghosts,[END]

old,tristifer,don't,mind,my,bony,arse,[END]
the,hammer,of,justice,they,called,him,[END]
been,a,long,while,since,he,heard,any,new,songs,[END]
the,outlaw,hopped,down,[END]
trim,and,slim,he,had,a,narrow,face,and,foxy,features,but,his,mouth,was,so,wide,that,his,smile,seemed,to,touch,his,ears,[END]

merrett,frowned,[END]

i,sang,at,your,daughter's,wedding,[END]

he,shrugged,[END]
why,is,it,your,lord,father,never,has,me,play,at,the,twins,[END]
don't,i,make,enough,noise,for,his,lordship,[END]
he,likes,it,loud,i,have,been,hearing,[END]
you,bring,the,gold,[END]
asked,a,harsher,voice,behind,him,[END]
merrett's,throat,was,dry,[END]
bloody,outlaws,always,hiding,in,the,bushes,[END]
